V03bsu058_u:5_2: prāptiratrayānaṃ, na gamanam / niryāṇaṃ yāti niryāṇaṃ niryāti aneneti /
V03bsu058_u:5_9: anena śabdena sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇaprāptiḥ atroktā iti na gamyate /
V03bsu058_u:5_10: niryāti anena iti vā mārgo 'bhihita iti [cet],
V03bsu058_u:5_15: sa ca nāśritaḥ / kiṃ tarhi apunarāvṛttyartho niḥśabdo 'tra abhīṣṭaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:5_17: nānyasya / yataśca yāṃ samāpattikakṣā[māgamya vajropamāyā anantaraṃ sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇasaṃprāptiḥ] /
V03bsu058_u:5_18: / tatkakṣāto yad vyutthānena kakṣāntare gamanaṃ na sā na punarāvṛttiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:5_26: yasmāt ayamatra abhisaṃdhiḥ - nyā[yyā etena vidhinā pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ upalabdhiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:5_28: evaṃvidhāścātra varjyāḥ / ityasya pūrvaṃ vaktuṃ yogaḥ iti ādau pravrajyāvastunaḥ saṃniveśanam /
V03bsu058_u:5_29: śāsane praviṣṭasya anupete 'tra vṛtte śikṣāniḥ kṣepaṇādinā iyaṃ śikṣā /
V03bsu058_u:5_31: / poṣadhavastvādīnāmapi imānyatra kramakāraṇāni - paripoṣaṇaṃ yathā samāttāyā śi[kṣāyā kāle-kāle sūtramāśritya /
V03bsu058_u:5_33: / yasmin kāle ekatrāvasthānena arthasaṃpattiḥ tadavasthānagatau vidhiḥ ityato varṣavastu
V03bsu058_u:5_34: // niyatavāsātmake varṣavāsānte dṛṣṭādibhiḥ tribhiḥ sthānaiḥ [VinSū_4] saṃghaṃ pravārayāmīti śuddhau satyāṃ utsargadānasya yujyamānatā ityato 'nantaraṃ pravāraṇāvastu /
V03bsu058_u:5_37: asya anantaraṃ tasya kramaḥ iti kaṭhinavastu niveśitam /
V03bsu058_u:5_38: / pṛthaktatra nāpattau cīvaravibhāgasya yogaḥ iti apagatattvena tayoḥ vyūhabandhayo cīvaradānasya kālaḥ iti cīvaravidheḥ āśrayaṇam /
V03bsu058_u:5_40: / na vinā rogapratīkāreṇa eka(ḥ) pṛthagvā vihartu śakyata i[ti sahapratyā] sannābhyāṃ pūrvāparakālābhyāṃ pratha(ma)meva cīvaradānakāle prāyaśo glānyā pātasya bhāvaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:5_43: ityatonantaraṃ karmavastu // udvṛttānāṃ praṇidhikarmārhādīnāṃ praṇidhikarmakaraṇādinā niyamanaṃ pratyāpādanaṃ ca avasāraṇādinā yuktamityataḥ pratikriyāvastu /
V03bsu058_u:5_50: ityasmādadhikaraṇavastu // yatraitad sarvaṃ anyaśca kuśalapakṣo 'nuṣṭhīyate sthāne,
V03bsu058_u:5_52: / kṣudrakādīnāṃ caitad - prabhedabhūtatvāt anatireka ebhyaḥ iti na pṛthaksūtraṇam /
V03bsu058_u:5_54_0: ācāryopādhyāhyānujñānāt [anantaraṃ] yaḥ pravrajyopanayavidhiḥ tadupadarśanārthamāha - (2) sarvasmin sannipatite saṃghe kṛtedaveṣaṃ
V03bsu058_u:5_54_1: nipatya pragṛhītāñjaliṃ utkuṭukasthaṃ vṛddhānte yācitavantaṃ trirjñapticaturthena karmaṇā saha pravrajyopasaṃpadau upanayeyuḥ
V03bsu058_u:5_61: tasya cābhisaṃbandhaḥ / vṛddhānte nipatya pañcamaṇḍalakena vandanāṃ kṛtvā ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:5_65: / nanū niṣaṇṇasya utkuṭukikayā vṛddhānte pragṛhītāñjalitvaṃ ityetatsaṃghādhīne karmaṇi-paribhāṣāyāṃ sarvakarmādhikārikaṃ sūtritam /
V03bsu058_u:5_66_0: tata eva ihāpi karmatvāt asya tritayasya prāptau satyāṃ [VinSū_5] kimiti punarvacanam - 'vartamānakalpādhikārikatvāt pragṛhītāñjali'
V03bsu058_u:5_67_0: / yācitavantamiti kim / pravrajyopasaṃpadau / yācanaṃ punaḥ - “śṛṇotu, bhadantāḥ saṃgho, ahamevaṃnāmā ākāṅkṣāmisvākhyāte
V03bsu058_u:5_68: / anena mantreṇa triryācitavantaṃ jñapticaturthena karmaṇā iti tisro vācanā jñapticaturthā yasmin karmaṇi tad jñapticaturthaṃ karma,
V03bsu058_u:5_71: / tathā ca mantraḥ”śṛṇotu, bhadantāḥ saṃgho, ayamevaṃnāmā ākāṃkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ yāvat prāvrājita upasaṃpādita evaṃnāmā saṃgheneti” /
V03bsu058_u:5_72: / iti purākalpaḥ // iti-śabdaḥ prakāravācī // purākalpa iti vartamānakalpāt prāk evaṃ-prakāraḥ pravrajyopasaṃpadvidhirityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:5_73: / atha kimiti vartamānakalpa eva bhagavatā na prākprajñaptaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:5_74: kiṃ nā purākalpatyāgena asya vidheḥ punaḥ prajñapanam? [iti cet],
V03bsu058_u:5_78: [na] glānyameṣāṃ, kṛtapuṇyatvāt asat na saṃpadyate - 'saṃpanne vā bhavantyeṣāṃ svayamevānukampakāḥ' /
V03bsu058_u:5_81: yadā tvanyavidhā apyete jātāḥ tadottarasya saṃprattaṃ naiva kaścidupayogaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:5_85: tatredaṃ mantratantram / etāvanmātrakamevāsīt, dvikamevaitadāsī(t) / vinayavaśādasya aparasyātravidheḥ vyavasthā-[na]-mityāsyārthasya khyāpanārthaṃ asyopanibandhaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:6_0: vartamānakalpa idānī[mucyate] - (3) niśritasya kaṃcidbhikṣuṃ tatropādhyāyatayā pravrajyopasaṃpadau /
V03bsu058_u:6_1: / kaṃcidbhikṣumiti / nāvaśyaṃ, yanniśritya pravrajyā tamevopasaṃpaditi pradarśanārthaṃ kaṃcit - iti vacanam /
V03bsu058_u:6_4: pravrajyopasaṃpadapekṣaṃ / nimittasaptamī caiṣā / pravrajyopasaṃpannimittaṃ upādhyāyatvena kaṃcidbhikṣuṃ niśritasya pravrajyopasaṃpadau bhavataḥ,
V03bsu058_u:6_7: tenānusaktā veditavyāḥ / pra[vra]jyā śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraśca ubhayamapyenaṃ niśritasya /
V03bsu058_u:6_9: saṃvaraḥ punaranyata iti / niśritasya niśrayaparigrahe vidhimāha - (4) pṛṣṭvā āntarāyikaṃ pariśuddhāya pūrvo [pādhyāyatvenā vakā]śaṃ kuryāt /
V03bsu058_u:6_12: na santi cet asya te dharmāḥ [VinSū_6] tataḥ pariśuddhāyāsmai pūrvopādhyāyatvena śrāmaṇeropādhyāyatvena avakāśaṃ kuryāt - 'ahaṃ bhadantaṃ pravrājayāmi' iti /
V03bsu058_u:6_13: tathā ca granthaḥ - “yasya kasyacit pravrajyāpekṣa upasaṃkrāmati,
V03bsu058_u:6_14: sa tenāntarāyikān dharmān pṛṣṭa udgṛhītavya” iti /
V03bsu058_u:6_16: eṣāmupāsakatvādīnāṃ pūrvaṃ-pūrvaṃ parvānupapannasya tādātmyopagatyā anupagatasya uttaraṃ uttaraṃ parva na kāryam /
V03bsu058_u:6_17: vyavasthākhyānametad // pṛṣṭvā āntarāyikān pravrajyāpekṣaṃ ādāvupāsakatvaṃ grāhayet,
V03bsu058_u:6_18: tataḥ śrāmaṇeratvaṃ, tato bhikṣutvaṃ bhavati ityasya bodhanārthaṃ /
V03bsu058_u:6_23: śaraṇagamaṇapūrvakaṃ saṃvarādānamiti darśayannāha - (6) śara[ṇa]gatyabhyupaga[mavaca]nopakramaṃ upāsakatva-śrāmaṇeratvābhyupagamavacanaṃ kurvīta /
V03bsu058_u:6_24: / gatirgamanam / śaraṇagamanasyābhyupagamaḥ śaraṇagatyabhyupagamaḥ - buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmītyādi /
V03bsu058_u:6_27: / ko 'sau? pratīpattā, ayamarthaḥ / evaṃ samādātrā vaktavyam - “sāmanvāhara bhadanta ahaṃ evaṃnāmā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi yāvat gaṇānāmagryam,
V03bsu058_u:6_29: samanvāhara bhadanta ahamevaṃnāmā buddhaṃ yāvat gaṇānāmagryaṃ /
V03bsu058_u:6_32: / ye[na]tu ke[na]ciccharaṇagamanaṃ ādau trirāvartya tataḥ paścādupāsakaṃ māṃ bhadanto dhārayatu,
V03bsu058_u:6_35: evaṃ sati, śaraṇagamanoktiḥ naiva aṅgabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
V03bsu058_u:6_36: kiñca yena prāgeva śaraṇagamanamātraṃ [abhyupagamyate] tasya saṃvarādānakāle śaraṇagamanasyāvacanīyatāpattiḥ
V03bsu058_u:6_38: evam hyetad saṃvarasamādānavacasoḥ aṅgaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:6_41: upasaṃpadastarhi śaraṇagamanavacanamantareṇa kathaṃ rūḍhiḥ? naiṣa doṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:6_45: yataḥ upasaṃpadi sthitaḥ nirvāṇānuguṇyo vyavasthito bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:6_46: / kurvīta ityātmanepadaṃ pratipattyā etat karanīyaṃ ityetatsaṃdarśanārtham /
V03bsu058_u:6_48: na dānagrahaṇam, upoṣadhe 'pi pratipatturevaitatkaraṇīyaṃ iti mantavyam /
V03bsu058_u:6_49: yatte dānagrahaṇadharmaḥ tatra iti kecid varṇayanti śikṣaṇādeva /
V03bsu058_u:6_53: pūrvatra pañcānāṃ, uttaratra daśānām, kena prakāreṇa ityāha - abhyupagamarūpeṇa /
V03bsu058_u:6_55: no tu idaṃ cedaṃ ca rakṣyaṃ yattvayā samāttam iti /
V03bsu058_u:6_65: / [jñaptyādi]-karmātmakatvādasya anupasaṃpannenāpi saṃghe pravrajyāpekṣasya ārocanaṃ na virudhyata ityasya vikalpasya vyudāsārthaṃ bhikṣave iti vacanam /
V03bsu058_u:6_66: tathā ca granthaḥ - tataḥ paścāt bhikṣuradhyeṣitavyaḥ - yo 'syārocayate iti /
V03bsu058_u:6_69: saṃgho samanvāhrīyatāṃ - ayamevaṃnāmā pravrajyāpekṣo gṛhītāvadātavasanaḥ” ityādinā mantreṇārocayediti yatparasmaipadaṃ tad paravyāpāreṇāsya pravṛtterasvārthatvāt /
V03bsu058_u:6_70: na hi atra yathā upādhyāye putra iva pravṛtteḥ svārthatvamevāsya /
V03bsu058_u:6_71: / kathaṃ avasthite saṃghe ārocayedityāha - (10) sarvasannipāte vā [sanniṣaṇṇe ']nulayane vā /
V03bsu058_u:6_73: parigaṇo hi layanaviśeṣaḥ // yeṣāṃ saṃnidhau ārocyate teṣāṃ yo vidhiḥ taddarśayannāha - (11) sa cetpariśuddha
V03bsu058_u:6_74: iti sarve brū yuḥ // sa cet yadīryarthaḥ / ārocanottarakālaṃ pravrajyāpekṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:6_77: / upādhyāyatvena adhiṣṭhāpayan nāpitakārya-saṃdarśanārthaṃ avatārayeta iti ātmanepadam /
V03bsu058_u:6_78: na tu evaṃ mantavyaṃ upāḍhyāyenaivaitad svayaṃ kartavyamiti /
V03bsu058_u:6_81: tatra apratīkṣyopādhyāyopayogaṃ keśaśmaśru-avatārane anyena saṃpādite na punarupādhyāye - nātra pravartitavyamiti mantavyam /
V03bsu058_u:6_82: / ācūḍamiti cūḍāto 'nyat / daḍhikāpanaye 'pi na tathā vairūpyabuddhiryathā syāt /
V03bsu058_u:6_83: tasmānniścito 'yaṃ na vā iti praśnena vijñānārthamasya sthāpanam - (14) avatāryatāṃ cūḍeti pṛṣṭenānujñāte,
V03bsu058_u:6_84: tam // avatāryatāṃ cūḍā iti pṛṣṭena satā pravrājyena yadyanujñātaṃ bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:6_85: tato 'nujñāte tena cūḍāvataraṇe tāṃ cūḍāṃ avatāra[yedi]tyanuvartate /
V03bsu058_u:6_87: / kālānurūpeṇāmbhasā / snānottarakālaṃ ca (16) upādhyāyaḥ kāṣā[yā]ṇi vastrāṇi dadyāt /
V03bsu058_u:6_91: / na ca vinagnaṃ kṛtvā, api tu asaṃcetitaṃ - yathā 'sau na [jā]nī te 'dṛṣṭaṃ me 'nena vyañjana'miti /
V03bsu058_u:6_97: taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ 'yāvatpravrajyāliṅgaṃ samādade' ityanena ma[ntreṇopādhyāya]ḥ śaraṇagamanaprārambhaṃ pravrajyāmupanayet,
V03bsu058_u:6_99: nānvayaṃ saṃvara? iti / ko 'syāṃ śa[ra]ṇagamanopakramatvenārtha iti kecidāhuḥ /
V03bsu058_u:6_101: sarvaṃ ca sāstravaṃ vastu, abhiratasya tatra niveśanaṃ, tasmāt saṃsāravaimukhyaṃ niveśanaparityāgasya kārtsnyam /
V03bsu058_u:6_102: na ca nirvāṇā pāśrayeṇa saṃsāravaimukhyasya saṃpattiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:6_103: tasmāt, saṃvaravat atrāpi nirvāṇāśayaprarūpaṇaṃ kartavyam ityatrāpi śaraṇagamanopakramam /
V03bsu058_u:6_104: kecit pravrajyopanayanamantre 'pravrajyāliṅgaṃ samādade' ityataḥ purastāt 'śrāmaṇeraṃ māṃ upādhyāyo dhārayatu' iti paṭhanti' tadayuktam /
V03bsu058_u:6_108: śrāmaṇeratvopanayanamantre pravrajyopagatirapi taiḥ paṭhyate - 'taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ yāvat - pravrajyāliṅgaṃ samādade /
V03bsu058_u:6_110: evaṃ nāmnopādhyāyena śrāmaṇeraṃ māmācāryo dhārayatu' iti /
V03bsu058_u:6_112: / (21) yāñcānantaraṃ vā / iti pravrajyā[mupana]yeta iti vartate /
V03bsu058_u:6_114: pravrājayitavya' iti / ayamabhiprāyaḥ tesāṃ - yathā śrāmaṇeratvaṃ evaṃ keśāvatāraṇādikamapi pravrajitasyaiva vṛttamiti /
V03bsu058_u:6_116: evaṃ pravrajyopādhyāyaḥ taṃ - (22) śrāmaṇeratvopanāyine arpayet bhikṣave /
V03bsu058_u:6_119: yadasya śāmaṇerasaṃvaropanetuḥ upanayanābhijñānaṃ prati cetasaḥ praguṇatvaṃ e(ta)datra tacchīlyena āśritaṃ ve(di)tavyam /
V03bsu058_u:6_120: yasyopanayanārthaṃ arpyate / sau - (23) 'kaścit pariśuddha' iti pṛṣṭvā śuddhamupanayet /
V03bsu058_u:6_121: / (24) sa ācārya iti // ya eṣa śrāmaṇeratvopanāyī sa ācāryo draṣṭavyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:6_123: ācāryā iti / samuccayārthaḥ ca-śabdaḥ // kiyataiṣāṃ ācāryatvānāṃ jātatvamityāha - (26) vṛtte 'rthe bhūtatvam /
V03bsu058_u:6_125: tadyathā - śrāmaṇeratvopanayanena arthena śrāmaṇerācāryatve vṛtte tasminnavasite arthe,
V03bsu058_u:6_127: tasmāt vṛtteṣūpanayanādiṣu eṣāṃ ācāryatvānāṃ jātatvaṃ veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:6_128: kimupādhyāyatvasyāpi [VinSū_9] yenārthena asau upādhyāyaḥ tasminnavasite 'rthe jātatvamityāha - (27) abhupagatāvupādhyāyasya yāñcāyāṃ tadudbhūtiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:6_129: / yāñcākāle upādhyāyasya ya 'bhyupagatiḥ tasyāṃ upādhyāyatvasya udbhūtiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:6_132: tasyārthasya kadā vṛttatā ityāha - (28) āvṛttau tṛtīye 'ṅge antyāyāṃ vṛttatvam /
V03bsu058_u:6_133: / yatrāvarttī so 'rtho, yadaṃśaṃ ācāryatvādīnāṃ vṛttatvaṃ sā āvṛttiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:6_134: tasyāṃ arthasya vṛttatva / tisraśca tāścāvṛttayaḥ / tatra na jñāyate ka[ta]rasyāmāvṛttau āvṛttervā katamasminnaṃśa iti /
V03bsu058_u:6_138: / udāharaṇena enamarthaṃ prajñapayati - (29) tadyathā parotkīrtanakāle śrāmaṇeratvasya /
V03bsu058_u:6_140: śrāmaṇeraṃ ca mamityataḥ parastāt 'ācārya' iti yatparotkīrtanaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:6_141: tatra śrāmaṇeratvakārake yaḥ upanetuḥ arthaḥ śrāmaṇerasaṃvaro nāma,
V03bsu058_u:6_142: tasya vṛtta[tvaṃ mantavyaṃ, ā]cāryo dhārayatu ityatra mantavyam,
V03bsu058_u:6_143: na bhadanto dhārayatu iti // (30) paścime 'tra upādhyāyatvasya iti /
V03bsu058_u:6_144: vṛttatvaṃ iti vartate // atreti parotkīrtanakāle bahūpādhyāyayācane 'samanvāhara' iti śabdāt bhikṣusaṃbaṃdhotkīrtanātparāṇi upādhyāyotkīrtanāni /
V03bsu058_u:6_145: tatra yattṛtīyotkīrtanaṃ upādhyāyena pravrajiṣyāmi upasaṃpatsye vā iti,
V03bsu058_u:6_146: ataḥ pūrvaṃ yaḥ [tasminkāle] upādhyāyārthaḥ tasya amyupagama[sya] ātmano vṛttatvam /
V03bsu058_u:6_148: upasaṃpadi ca / yadi pūrvameva nopādhyāyo bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:6_149: nācāryeṇa vā, bhadantena vā iti / apracchedataḥ cātra tṛtīyoṃ 'śo veditavyaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:6_150: nākṣaraparimāṇataḥ / evaṃ hi upādhyāyayācane trayaḥ pracchedāḥ bhavanti - 'ahaṃ evaṃnāmā bhadantamupādhyāyaṃ yāce' /
V03bsu058_u:6_153: upasaṃpatsye vā' iti // śrāmaṇeratvopagatau tu prabaṃdhapracchedau - śaraṇagamanaṃ śrāmaṇeratvābhyupagamaśca /
V03bsu058_u:6_154: tatra paścimaṃ pracchedaṃ avāntarārthānugatyā śrāmaṇeraṃ māmiti,
V03bsu058_u:6_155: ācāryo dhārayatu iti dvidhā kṛtvā tritvamadhyavasitam /
V03bsu058_u:6_156: kasmātpunaḥ asamāptāyāmeva ābṛttau tṛtīye 'ṅgatvasya vṛttatvaṃ bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:6_157: yadbhūyaḥ kṛtaṃ iti kṛtvā sarveṣveva cāyaṃ sīmābandhādiṣu vidhirdraṣṭavyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:6_158: tadevaṃ raho'nuśāsakasya aparyavasitāyāṃ rahasyanuśiṣṭau ācāryatvaṃ śrāmaṇeratvopanāyino 'tra kāle karmakārakasya evaṃvidhamiti kṛtam /
V03bsu058_u:6_161: / tatra yāvatā anayoḥ ācāryatā-kṛ[ta]tvaṃ tadākhyāyate - (31) paryanto niḥśrayadānasyaikarātraṃ niśrayatvena pratyupasthānam /
V03bsu058_u:6_162: ekarātraḥ eko 'horātraḥ, ekarātram / niśrayācāryasya niśritaṃ prati niśrayatvena yatpratyupasthānameva [paryantatvaṃ],
V03bsu058_u:6_163: niśrayadānasya paryantaḥ / tathā ca graṃthaḥ - 'niśrayācāryaḥ katamaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:6_164: yasyāntike ekāmapi [VinSū_10] rātriṃ niśrayeṇoṣito bhavati' iti /
V03bsu058_u:6_166: arvāk tatspṛṣṭimātrakaṃ agataparyantaṃ akṛtatvena manasi nilīyamānaṃ na niśrayasaṃkhyāṃ gantumarhati /
V03bsu058_u:6_168: / yasyāntikāt paṭhanābhiprāyeṇa trirekāgāthā parivartitā sa pāṭhācāryaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:6_169: evaṃ hi pāṭhasya paryantaḥ / tathā ca graṃthaḥ - 'pāṭhācāryaḥ katamaḥ? yasyāntikāt āvṛttasya dvikā 'pi gāthā triḥ parivartyaṃ udgṛhītā bhavati' iti /
V03bsu058_u:6_172: sakṛduktau ca spṛṣṭimātrakaṃ aparipūrṇarūpaṃ paṭhanaṃ manasi nilīyate /
V03bsu058_u:6_175: / ācāryo ratnasiṃhastu āha - pāṭhaparyantāḥ evaṃ-vidhā eva,
V03bsu058_u:6_177: / evaṃ tu yujyate, yasmād yadasau granthaṃ anapekṣya sūtrayati /
V03bsu058_u:6_182: tadyathā, svādhyāyanikādau pāṭha evāsau na bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:6_186: / enau ācāryopādhyāyau / upo[ccāri]padaṃ upapadam / āyuṣmantabhadanta-sthaviropapadaiḥ nopapadayitavyau /
V03bsu058_u:6_187: nirupapadanāmagrahaṇaṃ tu anayoḥ ['vṛddhasya nirupapadaṃ nāṃa na gṛhṇīyāt ityanenaiva pratiṣiddhaṃ veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:6_191: / (36) nānuktvā sahitaṃ arthahetoḥ nāma gṛhaṇāmi ityupādhyāyanāma gṛhṇīyāt /
V03bsu058_u:6_193: arthahetoḥ nāma gṛhṇāmītyanena vākyena sahitaṃ upādhyāyanāma gṛhṇīyāt,
V03bsu058_u:7_2: api tu saṃghādupasaṃpat // (38) upādhyāyatāyāṃ unmukhībhūtaḥ karmakārakaṃ adhīcchet rahonuśāsakaṃ ca bhikṣum /
V03bsu058_u:7_6: na karmakārakārtham / karmaparibhāṣāyāṃ yaḥ karmavidhiruktaḥ tata eva tasya bhikṣutvasiddheḥ /
V03bsu058_u:7_14: / veṣārthatvā adhiṣṭhān, adhiṣṭhānānantaraṃ eṣāṃ prāvaraṇamiti mantavyam /
V03bsu058_u:7_15: / (41) pātraṃ copadarśya monaṃ adhikaṃ pāṇḍare (raṃ) veti saṃghe /
V03bsu058_u:7_22: evaṃ-bhāvaḥ evaṃtvam / [tadūnatvā]-didoṣopetatvam / naivaṃ-tvaṃ anaivaṃ-tvaṃ, etaddoṣavimuktatvaṃ ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:7_23: / (43) apakramite, ka iti ākhyāpya rahonuśāsakaṃ utsāhya karmakārakaḥ saṃgha enamanujñāpayet /
V03bsu058_u:7_26: atra apakāsanārthaḥ, nā 'nyo dṛśyate / tasmāt yatra sthitasyāsya etacchravaṇaṃ na gacchati,
V03bsu058_u:7_28: purastād vakṣyate - darśanopavicāre enaṃ apakāsanena sthāpayeyuḥ gaṇābhimukhaṃ pragṛhītāñjalimiti /
V03bsu058_u:7_29: ka iti ākhyāpyeti ko 'dhīṣṭaḥ evaṃ-nāmnā evaṃ-nāmnā rahonuśāsakaḥ ityanena mantreṇa 'ahamevaṃ-nāmā' ityākhyāpya rahonuśāsakam /
V03bsu058_u:7_31: utsahase tvaṃ ityā dinā enamiti rahonuśāsakaṃ anujñāpayet iti /
V03bsu058_u:7_33: / kecit etadgate mantre yat saṃghasya evaṃ-nāmānaṃ rahonuśāsakaṃ saṃmanyeta iti paṭhanti tad ayuktam,
V03bsu058_u:7_36: iti vyavasthā / tad yadevaṃ-nāmā rahonuśāsakaḥ evaṃ-nāmānaṃ rahasi anuśiṣyādityatra [abhyanujñāyāṃ yuktaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:7_40: / śruṇu tvamāyuṣman, ayaṃ te satyakālaḥ ityādeḥ mantrasya śṛṇu tvamityanena paden ulliṅganam /
V03bsu058_u:7_41: tiṣṭha, mā / śabditaḥ āgamiṣyasi ityenamuktvā iti samanuśiṣṭe /
V03bsu058_u:7_43: / iti vyavasthā // śruṇotu bhadantaḥ saṃgho 'ya manuśiṣto mayā evaṃ-nāmetyādinā mantreṇa /
V03bsu058_u:7_45: / iti saṃghaḥ // (46) sa cet pariśuddha iti sarve brūyuḥ /
V03bsu058_u:7_46: / iti upasaṃpādaka-bhikṣavaḥ // kecidatra pūrvatra ca pravrajyārthamārocanāvacane prativacanaṃ adhīyate - sarvasaṃghena vaktavyaṃ sa cet pariśuddha iti /
V03bsu058_u:7_53: ayaṃ te satyakālaḥ, ayaṃ te bnūtakāla ityādinā mantreṇa āntarāyikaparipraśnaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:7_54: / (49) upasaṃpadamupanayet // jñapticaturthena karmaṇā // [avasarārtha karma]kārakaḥ // (50) chāyāṃ vedayeta anantaraṃ mitāmiti /
V03bsu058_u:7_56: anantaraṃ avilambitam / kathaṃ vedayeta ityāha - mitāṃ saśeṣakāryasya āsanabhaṅgāyogāt karmakārakādanyena asya mānasya yogaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:7_57: tatpunaḥ mānamasya padādīnāṃ kena ityāha - (51) śaṃkunāṃ catura [ṅgulena eta] tsādhu /
V03bsu058_u:7_58: / etaditi mānaṃ ciratvābhāvāya caturaṅgulena mānaṃ śobhanam /
V03bsu058_u:7_60: / sādhu iti vartate / asyeti caturaṅgulasya śaṃkoḥ,
V03bsu058_u:7_61: yāvantaḥ śaṅkavaḥ tāvat pauruṣīcchāyā vaktavyā ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:7_63: vedayeta ityanuvartate / pūrvāhaṇo madhyāhan ityādi granthottam /
V03bsu058_u:7_64: / (54) samayaṃ ca [pañcaite // vedaye]ta / pañcaite iti samayāḥ (55) haimantiko,
V03bsu058_u:7_65: griṣmiko, vārṣiko, mitavārṣiko, dīrghavārṣikaḥ iti // parimāṇameṣāmucyate - (56) cāturmāsikau pūrvau /
V03bsu058_u:7_66: haimantiko grīṣmikaśca // (57) māsaṃ paraṃ / iti vārṣikaḥ // (58) tato ahorātrah iti / tato vārṣikātparo mitavārṣikaḥ eko ahorātraḥ /
V03bsu058_u:7_71: pāṃsukūlādayaste catvāraḥ // (61) patanīyān dharmān / pārājikān // (62) śramaṇakārakāṃśca / ākruṣṭenana pratyākroṣṭavyamityādikān ārocayediti vartate /
V03bsu058_u:7_72: / (63) saṃpannatāṃ samyaktayā ca prepsitasya udgrāhya śīlasāmānyagatatā 'rāgaṇe niyuñjīta /
V03bsu058_u:7_74: yaste bhūtapūrva āśāsakaḥ 'kaccidahaṃ labheya' ityādi idamasyābhilaṣitam /
V03bsu058_u:7_77: samyaktā punaḥ sampannatāyāḥ pratirūpeṇopādhyāyena ityādinā abhihitā /
V03bsu058_u:7_78: saṃpannatāmudgrāhya kiṃ karttavyam ityāha - śīla sāmānya gatatā-ārāgaṇe niyuñjīta /
V03bsu058_u:7_79: / yatra varṣaśatopasaṃpannena ityādinā śīlena sāmānyagatatā śīlasāmānyagatatā /
V03bsu058_u:7_83: tasya pratibimbanaṃ - adyāgreṇa te upādhyāyasya mātṛpitṛ-saṃjñetyādinā /
V03bsu058_u:7_84: evaṃ te so 'bhyasto gṛhisaṃbaṃdhaḥ pratibimbayitavyaḥ iti /
V03bsu058_u:7_88: / imāni ca imāni te mayā audārikaudārikau [itye]vamādinā,
V03bsu058_u:7_89: saṃprati anākhyātasya samāttasya vṛttasya [VinSū_13] parijñāmeva saṃpatsyate iti /
V03bsu058_u:7_90: / (68) ādare niyuñjīta // 'eṣatvamupasaṃpanna' iti gāthābhyāṃ 'prāstadikasya' iti anayā kṣaṇasampado daurlabhyaṃ darśayati,
V03bsu058_u:7_92: labdhe 'pi prāpye 'nukampakaiḥ dṛṣṭi saṃpanne ca manuṣyatve bahavo 'tra apariśuddhisaṃkhyā antarāyā [vairū]pyaṃ ca /
V03bsu058_u:7_93: tasmāt durlabhā eṣā // (69) sopāyākhyānaṃ ca saṃpādane /
V03bsu058_u:7_95: yadarthaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpat tatsaṃpādane niyuñjīta - upasaṃpannastvaṃ āyuṣman apramādena saṃpādaya ityanena /
V03bsu058_u:7_98: sāmīcyām ādau triḥkaraṇaṃ saṃghasaṃghaṭitāyāṃ anuśiṣṭau ca niṣa[ṇṇasyo]tkuṭukikayā purataḥ iṣṭake pārṣṇibhyāṃ rahonuśiṣṭau upasaṃpadi sthitasya pātraṃ vāme pāṇau pratiṣthāpya,
V03bsu058_u:7_99: praticchādya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā ityādeḥ karmavastuni vakṣyamāṇatvāt iha anupanibandhaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_2: / karaṇīyeṣu avalokanaprasaktasya kiṃcitkaraṇīyasya apṛṣtvā 'pi karaṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā,
V03bsu058_u:9_4: / yad antarvyāpārasaṃkhyena kaṇḍanādinā vyāpāreṇa abhivyāpyate taccaityāṅganam,
V03bsu058_u:9_7: / muktvā ityanubandhaḥ / ekānna[pañcāśat] iti 'āṭa'-sandhiḥ ekānnapañcāśat-vyāmasya paryantādyāvat ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_8: / yatra vihāre khātako vā prākāro vā anyo vā parivāro vidyate,
V03bsu058_u:9_9: tatra sa vihārānta iti adhyavasānaṃ yujyate /
V03bsu058_u:9_16: / anyacca, ataḥ caityābhivandanamiti tatra kiṃ pratipattavyam? - tadartha na gantavyam anāpṛṣṭvā /
V03bsu058_u:9_21: / nānāpṛcchya ālapitavyaṃ, na saṃlapitavyaṃ, na pratisaṃmoditavyaṃ, na prativacanaṃ dātavyaṃ, nodakadigdhena pāṇinā dharmitena pādau vā mukhaṃ vā hṛdayādikaṃ vā anuparimārṣṭavyaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:9_22: nodakena hastādeḥ [parimārjanaṃ(?) rajovakīrṇa]-vasrādi prasphoṭayitavyaṃ ityādeḥ iti hāsapadabhūtasya vṛttasya āpatteḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_23: / [VinSū_14] upānaha-dantakāṣṭha-pāṭhaḥ svādhyāyopasaṃhārāṇāṃ karaṇapratīṣṭoḥ tajjātīyasya bhikṣorantikāditi viśeṣaparigrahāt abhipretamatra abhinamanabhūtaṃ iti gamyate /
V03bsu058_u:9_24: duṣṭo 'tra pravrajito jñātaḥ śaṃkito vā anāpṛṣṭo [aparityakta]vyo(?),
V03bsu058_u:9_25: nānyaḥ / na hi paṭhati, svādhyāyaṃ vā kurvati, upasaṃhārasya tadanurūpe kāle karaṇaṃ ityādeḥ karaṇayītvena prajñānam /
V03bsu058_u:9_27: duṣṭe tu vipakṣānugatitvena etatpratibhāṣāmāṇaṃ ārambhatvena khyātimupagacchati /
V03bsu058_u:9_28: tasmāt yatra yatnaḥ kartavya ityatrābhiprāyo dṛśyate /
V03bsu058_u:9_29: / udakapānasya anāpṛcchākaraṇaṃ anena pravicāreṇa kṛtaṃ veditavyam
V03bsu058_u:9_30: // tadvidhaṃ hyetad yadvidhaṃ dharmitasya gātrāṇāmudakena saṃsparśanam /
V03bsu058_u:9_32: glānopasthāne, kaukṛtyaprativinodane, pāpakadṛṣṭigatapratiniḥsarge tīvraṃ autsukyamāpadyeta - aho bata ahaṃ kuryām kārayeyaṃ vā iti /
V03bsu058_u:9_35: / (74) saṃghe praṇidhātukāme - utkṣepaṇīyādi-praṇidhikarma kartukāme saṃghe aho bata saṃgho niśrayasyedaṃ praṇidhikarma na kuryāt /
V03bsu058_u:9_36: / iti tīvramautsukyamāpadyate, nivartate - yāvat āvṛhet iti sarvatraitadanuṣaktaṃ veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:9_37: / (75) kṛte avasārayet // iti praṇidhikarmaṇi kṛte - aho bata saṃgho 'sya avasārayet iti /
V03bsu058_u:9_38: / (76) parivā[sa]-mūlaparivāsamānāpya-mūlamānāpya-ābarhaṇārthini niśraye aho bata saṃgho asya aprivāsādicatuṣkaṃ dadyāt,
V03bsu058_u:9_40: / (77) so 'pyetadasmai kuryāt, utsṛjyāvalokanam // so 'pi niśrayaḥ / etad pātracīvarakarmādi / asmai niśritāya kuryāt / utsṛjyāvalokanaṃ avalokanamekaṃ muktvā /
V03bsu058_u:9_42: / upasaṃpadāya ūnadaśavarṣaḥ sa etat trayaṃ na kuryāt /
V03bsu058_u:9_45: / ye 'nantaraṃ vakṣyamāṇāḥ pañcāṅgikāḥ samāyogāḥ tebhyaḥ yena kenacit ekenā 'pi samanvito yogyo[nā 'nya i]ti bhāvaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_46: evañca yaduktaṃ aparairapi pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatena ityatra na samuccayo vijñātavyaḥ ebhiḥ imaiśca aparairiti /
V03bsu058_u:9_49: / kuta etad? / asaṃbhavāt sarvāsāmāsāṃ pañcikānāṃ sākṣyasya /
V03bsu058_u:9_50: / ādyāyāṃ tu pañcikāyāṃ daśavarṣa[tvāṅga] ukte daśavarṣo bhavatyupasaṃpadeti /
V03bsu058_u:9_51: tadebhiḥ daśavarṣagrahaṇaṃ ādau sarvasya uttarasya eṣa viṣayaparigraha iti khyāpanārtham /
V03bsu058_u:9_52: sthitārthatvaṃ vinaye, daśavarṣatve sati upādhyākaraṇādau kāraṇaṃ /
V03bsu058_u:9_53: viśeṣabhūtatvaṃ śeṣasya tatrā 'sti cet saviśeṣatvaṃ uttamakalpaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_55: yathā] śaikṣatvādeḥ viśeṣasya laṅghyatvam evamasyāpi daśavarṣatve sati vinaye sthitārthatvasyeti /
V03bsu058_u:9_61: / nā 'tra kāraṇagrahaṇena aśaktenā 'pi karaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ mantavyam /
V03bsu058_u:9_64: evañca atra bhavati anatilaṅghyasya kāraṇasya vinaye sthitārthatvasya alaṅghanam /
V03bsu058_u:9_66: / śaikṣatvaṃ aśaikṣatā ityataḥ prāk yatsahoktaṃ pañcakaṃ na bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:9_67: tadyathā - śraddhāśīlādisamāyogābhyāmanye samāyogāḥ tad śīlavattayā 'pi bāhuśrutyena ca sahitaṃ veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:9_69: śīlavattā atra duḥśīlena sārdhaṃ saṃvāsasyaiva ayogāt prativiśiṣṭā,
V03bsu058_u:9_71: / bāhuśrutyaṃ punaḥ yasmin samāyoge piṭakānāṃ grahaṇaṃ vidyate,
V03bsu058_u:9_73: vastu-pada-vākyādyaṅgānāṃ, chandovicityādeḥ, itihāsavṛttakānāṃ vā abhijñatvaṃ yatra na vidyate tatra piṭakānāṃ grahaṇaṃ boddhavyam /
V03bsu058_u:9_76_0: vinaye uktam - 'sūtradharo, vinayadharo, mātṛkādharaḥ; sūtravyakto, vinayasya vyakto, mātṛkāyāḥ vyaktaḥ, sūtrakuśalo, vinayakuśalo,
V03bsu058_u:9_76_1: mātṛkākuśalaḥ, sūtrakovido, vina[ya]kovido, mātṛkākovidaḥ' iti / tatra udgṛhītasyā vismṛtiḥ sūtrādidhāraṇam,
V03bsu058_u:9_77: piṭakatraye cedam // ekatra gatasya itaratradarśanāt sāṃkaryeṇa avasthitam /
V03bsu058_u:9_83: / piṭakānāṃ nānabhijñaḥ teṣu tad-grāhaṇe pratibalo bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:9_86: / śikṣadbhāvaḥ śikṣattā, dvaṃdvaikavadbhāvaḥ // adhiśīlagrahaṇena sarvasya vinayavṛttasya grahaṇam,
V03bsu058_u:9_91: na vikalpārtham / nāśikṣitaḥ adhiśīlādau tacchikṣaṇe pratibalo bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:9_92: viśeṣasyaiva etad 'śikṣā' iti vacanaṃ iti veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:9_94: iti / evaṃ iti anena śikṣattā, pratibalatvaṃ vā śikṣaṇāyāṃ ityasya [VinSū_16] parāmarśaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_97: vinayaḥ śeṣabhūtam / prātimokṣaśikṣaṇāḥ vastuvidhayaśca saparikarāḥ prātimokṣaḥ tadākhyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_107: ita ūrdhvaṃ prākśaikṣatvāt yatsahoktaṃ pañcakaṃ na bhavati tadārabdhaṃ-vīryatvaprājñatvābhyāṃ ca sahoktaṃ veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:9_109: / pratisaṃlīnatvam // samāhitatvam / iti // teṣāṃ etaccatuṣka-pūraṇam-śīlavān bhavati bahuśrutaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:9_110: ārabdhavīryaḥ, prājñaḥ, smṛtimān / punaretaccatuṣkamuktvā pratisaṃlīnaśca bhavatīti vaktavyam /
V03bsu058_u:9_111: punaḥ samāhita iti // (93) śaikṣatvamiti / śaikṣeṇa śīlaskandhena samanvāgato bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:9_112: śaikṣeṇa samādhi-prajñā-vimukti-vimukteḥ jñānadarśanaskandhena ityasya eṣā saṃgrahaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_113: / (94) aśaikṣatā iti // aśaikṣeṇa śīlaskandhena ityādeḥ yad anayoḥ dharmatā-viniyataṃ vṛttaṃ tatra yatsādhvasādhutāparijñānaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:9_116: tatrāpyetau daśavarṣāditvāt svātantrye vyavasthitau niyataṃ kṛtaprayatnau iti na atra anatilaṅdhyakāraṇā[d] atilaṃghanaṃ kṛtaṃ veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:9_120: prajñaptigraḥaṇena iyatā antike ca sthūlātyayo deśayitavyaḥ ityādeḥ grahaṇam /
V03bsu058_u:9_121: idamatra punaḥ pratikṣiptaṃ abhyanujñātaṃ ceti anuprajñaptiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_122: tadyathā - upānadabhyanujñānena saṇasaṇāpattiḥ ityādeḥ viśeṣasya pratiṣedhaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_124: atyantamidaṃ na kartavyamiti hi vidhānaṃ pratikṣepaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_126: abhyanujñā punaḥ yasya karaṇīyasya akaraṇe vā nā 'sti doṣaḥ kāmacāro 'tra pravṛttau /
V03bsu058_u:9_130: tade tad avinayābhijñatvaṃ adhikaṃ pañcakena khyāpitaṃ veditavyaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:9_132: / āntarāyika-anāntarāyika-abhijñatvaṃ ca ākhyāpitā ca anuśāsakatvaṃ [VinSū_17] ceti vigrahaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_135: tayoḥ abhijña-tvaṃ vinaye sthitārthatvasya etad-dvayaṃ udbhāvakam /
V03bsu058_u:9_136: ākhyāpitā punaḥ vaktuṃ bodhayituṃ vā asyaitad-dvayasya kauśalabhūtaṃ sāmarthyaṃ anālasyaṃ vā /
V03bsu058_u:9_141: tatra anuśāsti iti tulyaṃ anuśāsako bhavatīti - anena /
V03bsu058_u:9_142: avavadatīti manasikārārthaṃ ya upadeśaḥ tasyānena abhidhānam /
V03bsu058_u:9_148: 'bhijñatvādipañcakam / dvāvetau samāyogau, eko niśrayagataṃ atra catuṣke prakṣipya,
V03bsu058_u:9_149: aparaḥ upaniśrayagataṃ iti pratipādanārthaṃ vā śabdaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_152: upādhyāye anyatra vā niśraye tāvatkālikābhiprāyeṇa prakrāmati tiṣṭhati ca kasyaci jjanasya vaśāt upaniśrayagrāhaṇe (pratibalatvaṃ) upayujyate /
V03bsu058_u:9_158: na ca mantavyaḥ prātimokṣavistaraśabdo na vibhaṅgāt-śiṣṭasya vastukṣudrakādeḥ pratipādakaḥ iti /
V03bsu058_u:9_168: 'yāni tāni bhagavatā glānā[nāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ bhaiṣajyāni amyanujñātāni' iti bhaiṣajyavastunaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_169: 'anāgatānāṃ āyuṣmatāṃ ca chandaṃ ca pariśuddhiṃ ca ārocayata,
V03bsu058_u:9_170: mā samagrasya saṃghasya bhedaya parākramata' ityādeḥ kauśāmbikavastunaḥ saṃghabhedavastunaśca /
V03bsu058_u:9_173: saṃkrāmaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā saṃghe parivastavyam iti [ādinā pāṇḍulohitavastunaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_175: [VinSū_18] yad āpattivyavasthānasya paścāt karaṇadeśanā saṃghāvaśeṣapratideśanā ca,
V03bsu058_u:9_179: vacanāṅgabhūtaṃ tajjātīya-anyacchīlā (cāro iti) dvividhatvena prātimokṣaḥ vastūnāṃ śeṣaśca /
V03bsu058_u:9_180: kṣudrakāṇāṃ mātṛkāgatavastūnāṃ ca uktiḥ ityādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ pṛcchā /
V03bsu058_u:9_182: / carmavastvādayaḥ dārakeṣu / tathāhi etadanavaśiṣṭaṃ prātimokṣavistaratvaṃ na bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:9_186: / yadi vṛddhaḥ yena kenā 'pi pratirūpakena pañcakena samanvāgataḥ na syāt,
V03bsu058_u:9_187: tadā 'yaṃ vidhiḥ - bhadantaḥ bhikṣuḥ upasaṃpadaḥ ūnaṣaṣtivarṣaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:9_188: anena prātimokṣasūtraṃ vistareṇa udgṛhya paṭhitvā (dhāritaṃ) na bhavati tena,
V03bsu058_u:9_189: anyatra prakramitaṃ vā tena, upāli, anyaniśrayeṇa bhavitavyam iti uktam /
V03bsu058_u:9_190: atra ṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ asvataṃtraḥ (=niśritaḥ) api bāhuśrutyasya viśeṣābhāvāt 'vṛdhābhāve' ityādi uktam /
V03bsu058_u:9_193: anyatra vṛddhasya niśritena navakena (saha) anusaṃvāsayitavyaḥ ityabhiprāyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_194: / (101) caret aniśritaḥ pañcavarṣaḥ paścimasamāyogena samanvitaḥ janapadacārikām /
V03bsu058_u:9_196: tena ca samanvitaḥ pañcavarṣaḥ aniśritaḥ janapadacārikāṃ caret /
V03bsu058_u:9_198: / pañcadharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ, ūnapañcavarṣo 'pi, yato mārgāt vinayabhraṣṭo 'pi tato pañcavarṣaśīlabhāva-samāyogāt duḥkhavipariṇato bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:9_199: aparipūrṇavarṣo na bhavati ityatra abhisaṃdhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:9_200: 'traividyau 'pi' iti / niśraye niśritārthaṃ karaṇīyākaraṇīyaparijñānaṃ dvividhaṃ ca parivinītam /
V03bsu058_u:9_203: duṣkara-alpasaṃvitpratisevanayā āgatasaṃpadā ca karaṇīyākaraṇīyesu parijñānaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:9_207: kaścidarhan pūjākṣetraḥ, pūjākṣetrebhyaḥ saṃtīrṇaḥ, āyuṣmān [VinSū_19] pilindavatsaḥ ca gaṅgādevyai 'vṛṣalī'rti coditavān ityādi /
V03bsu058_u:9_208: anyacca, vinayaparijñānaṃ kathamapi na kṛtaṃ bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:9_209: duṣkaratvāt / sthūlakumāryoḥ sārdhaṃ ekabhūmau anavasthānavat udyameṣu ca antarāyabāhulyāt /
V03bsu058_u:9_210: vividhaṃ bhavati //] (yaduta) cet bhadanta traividyaḥ trivarṣa-trimalaprahīṇaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:9_212: tenā 'pi aniśritena janapadacārikā caritavyā? nopālin ityuktam /
V03bsu058_u:9_213: / rakṣyaṃ cānena vinayagataṃ, dūreṇa dūraṃ apasārayatu enaṃ parihṛtatāsaṃpattyartham /
V03bsu058_u:9_217: kenacidatikrame sati iti dhvaṃso 'nyathā śāsanasya saṃpadyate /
V03bsu058_u:9_218: tasmāt, yathaiva anyasya atra ananujñānaṃ tathaiva trividyasya /
V03bsu058_u:11_0: (103) mā 'si tīrthyaḥ iti pravrajyārthaṃ upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcchet,
V03bsu058_u:11_1: upasaṃpādakāśca // pṛcchet ityupādhyāyaḥ / pṛccheyuḥ iti pariṇātasya upasaṃ[pādakā i]tyanena saṃbaṃdhaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_3: tanniyuktatvāttasya // (104) na-anārādhitacittaṃ, utsṛjya śākyaṃ āgneyaṃ ca jaṭilaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:11_5: / śākyāgneyajātyoḥ nūnaṃ kiñcidāśayasabhāgyaṃ lakṣitam - 'niyataṃ anayoḥ pratipattau satyāṃ bhā[vataḥ prati-]pattiḥ na kṛtakena' iti /
V03bsu058_u:11_6: / yataḥ etadanujñātamiti pratipattavyam - yacca uktaṃ - 'dadāmyahaṃ jñātīnāṃ jñātiparihāram'iti,
V03bsu058_u:11_7: tatra jñātitvaṃ ananupaśyatāṃ eṣāṃ bhavataḥ pratipattiḥ bhaviṣyatīti bhagavatā 'vabuddham,
V03bsu058_u:11_12: / kṛt etad tīrthya-anārādhitādi-tīrthyānta-varjaṃ[na]m iti śabdāt pūrvatīrthyaśabdaṃ varjayitvā,
V03bsu058_u:11_13: 'anārādhitacittaṃ' utsṛjya 'śākyaṃ āgneyaṃ ca jaṭilaṃ tīrthyaṃ' ityetacca anārādhitaśabdādi-tīrthyaśabdāntaṃ varjayitvā yadetad 'mā 'si' ityādyu[ktaṃ ta]tkṛt-saṃjñaṃ veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:11_14: yatra 'kṛt' ityucyate tatra 'mā 'si' iti pravrajyārthamupasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcchet,
V03bsu058_u:11_15: upasaṃpādakāśca na pravrājayeyuḥ upasaṃpādayeyurvā' iti uccāritaṃ pratipattavyam /
V03bsu058_u:11_16: / kṛt-pradeśā iti ūrdhvaṃ atraiva pravrajyāvastuni kṣudrakeṣu ca etadgatesu /
V03bsu058_u:11_17: kiyatā tīrthyaḥ ārādhitacitto vaktavyaḥ iti nirjñānārthaṃ āha - (105) ratnānāṃ varṇasya tīrthyānāmavarṇasya bhūtasya uktau akupyatvaṃ ārādhitacittatā /
V03bsu058_u:11_18: / na kupyatīti akupyam, akupyadbhāvo 'kupyatvam // [VinSū_20] (106) tadartha atadvantamenaṃ kṛtopāsakatāntaṃ caturo māsān parivāsayet saṃgho datvā [parivāsaṃ karmaṇā /
V03bsu058_u:11_21: 'tad' iti tīrthyam / kṛtopāsakatāntaṃ iti upāsakatāntavidhiṃ kṛtvā upāsakatāntaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_22: evaṃ tatra jñapticaturthena karmaṇā saṃghaḥ caturo māsān parivāsaṃ dattvā parivāsayet /
V03bsu058_u:11_24: / (108) upādhyāyāt cīvaram // (109) kartṛtvaṃ karmādānasya (110) paripūrṇa]pañcadaśavarṣo 'si iti pravrajyārtha upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcchet /
V03bsu058_u:11_27: / dvāvetau na pravrājyau - asamarthaśca pañcadaśavarṣatvādūnaḥ samarthaśca saptavarṣatvāt /
V03bsu058_u:11_29: ārocakena ayaṃ aśuddha iti jñātvā na ārocayitavyam,
V03bsu058_u:11_32: / dvitīyaśramaṇoddeśānupasthāpane dvitīyasyāpravrājanamapi āpannaṃ tadapavādārtham āha - (113) aruciścet anakadhyaṃ pravrajyāyāṃ,
V03bsu058_u:11_34: / dvayoḥ pravrajyārthaṃ ekatra āvābhyāṃ pravrajitavyam - ityevaṃ niścitya āgatayoḥ yadi anaikadhyaṃ pṛthakpravrajyāyāṃ aruciḥ,
V03bsu058_u:11_37: / viṃśativarṣatvādyadi ūnaḥ tato anyasmai bhikṣave upaniśrayārthaṃ arpayitavyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_42: na samarpitakatayā, tasmāt* a[nā]cchedaḥ // (117) kṛt* dāsaḥ // kṛdityanayā saṃjñayā 'mā 'si' ityādeḥ saṃjñino dāse saṃbandhinaḥ pratyupasthānam /
V03bsu058_u:11_45: vākyaṃ cedamatra jñāyate / 'mā 'si dāsa' iti pravrajyārthaṃ upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcchet,
V03bsu058_u:11_46: upasaṃpādakāśca na dāsaṃ pravrājayeyu[rupasaṃpā]dayeyuḥ vā iti /
V03bsu058_u:11_47: / (118) vyasiste kasyacitkiṃviddeyaṃ alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā /
V03bsu058_u:11_50: tataśca idaṃ vākyam - “mā te kasyacitkiṃciddeyaṃ alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā” iti pravrajyārthamupasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcchet,
V03bsu058_u:11_51: upasaṃpādakāśca, na ṛṇavantaṃ pravrājaye[yurupa]saṃpādayeyuśca iti mantrāt /
V03bsu058_u:11_52: atra śakṣyāmi pravrajyopasaṃpadaṃ vā ādātuṃ iti pratijānānaṃ muktvā,
V03bsu058_u:11_54: / (119) jīvatpitṛkaṃ ananujñātaṃ tābhyāṃ adūradeśaṃ pravrajyāpekṣaṃ saptāhaṃ dhārayet /
V03bsu058_u:11_56: tābhyāmiti mātāpitṛbhyām / tābhyāṃ śabdācca mātāpitroratra pitṛ-śabdaḥ iti /
V03bsu058_u:11_59: tābhyāṃ ājīvatpitṛkasya tu anujñātasya vā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ anārocanamapi nirdoṣamiti pratipattavyam /
V03bsu058_u:11_60: tathā vā 'jīvātpitṛke pṛcchāpāṭhaḥ - yasya tāvat bhadanta mātāpitarau kālagatau bhavataḥ tiryagyonigatau vā ta[sya keśāvaro-]paṇāya sarvasaṃgho 'valokayitavyaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:11_61: 'no hīdaṃ upālin' iti / dūradeśagrahaṇaṃ kimarthaṃ kṛtam /
V03bsu058_u:11_62: yato anyatamayā gṛhapatipatnyā putraḥ pravrajitaḥ āgatyoktaḥ - 'tvaṃ eṣāṃ
V03bsu058_u:11_71: / yuktamiti naiṣa niyamaḥ, avadhyāne tesāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pravṛtteḥ iti khyāpayati /
V03bsu058_u:11_72: / (122) kṛt* anujñāto 'si mātāpitṛbhyāṃ ante muktvā dūradeśakam /
V03bsu058_u:11_74: kṛditi anena uktasyānte muktvā dūradeśakamityayaṃ śabdo 'dhikaḥ pratipattavyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_76: pravrajyārthamityādi yāvat nānanujñātaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ pravrājayeyurupasaṃpādayeyurvā muktvā dūradeśakam iti /
V03bsu058_u:11_83: / pṛcchedityasya pariṇatasya pṛcche[yu]rityanuṣaṅgaḥ bhavanti khalu puruāāṇāmete evaṃ-rūpāḥ kāye kāyikābādhāḥ,
V03bsu058_u:11_88: / (127) kṛt prākpraṇihitāt // “na abhyupagato nimittaviparyayaṃ praṇihitaṃ” ityataḥ prāk yāvannirdeśaḥ sarvatra kṛditi adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:11_89: sarve te kṛtsaṃbaṃdhinaḥ // (128) nāsti asya prarohaṇadharmatā iti ca /
V03bsu058_u:11_90: / yo 'tra pratiṣidhyate nirmitādiḥ tasya 'ca'-śabdaḥ prākpraṇihitāditi saṃbaṃdhārthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_94: / gṛhasthabhūtasya tu bhikṣumadhye [VinSū_22] vasato yātrika-prayojanavaśāt nāśanaṃ na vā /
V03bsu058_u:11_101: / (131) paṇḍakaḥ // pāñcavidhyamasyeti // asyeti paḍākasya // [pañcavidhaṃ katamam /] // (132) jātyā-, pakṣa-, āsaktaprādurbhāva-, īrṣyā[prādurbhāva]-āpatkṛt* iti /
V03bsu058_u:11_102: / jātyā jāti paṇḍako, yo janmanā eva nastrī na puruṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_103: / pakṣa iti yaḥ pakṣe strī pakṣe puruṣaḥ sa pakṣapaṇḍakaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_104: pakṣo 'rdhamāsaḥ // āsaktaprādurbhāva iti yasya pareṇa upakrāntasya prādurbhāvo bhavati [sa] āsaktapaṇḍakaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_105: / īrṣyayā yasya pareṇa upakrāntaṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā prādurbhāvo bhavati sa īrṣyāpaṇḍakaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_106: / ā[pa]tkṛt iti āpatpaṇḍako, yasya chedādinā puruṣendriyaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:11_108_0: / antyasyeti āpatpaṇḍakasya // sapadi paṇḍakadoṣaṃ bhajate, tato nāśayitavyo, nānyathā ityarthaḥ // (134) steya-saṃvāsika //
V03bsu058_u:11_108_1: ityasya lakṣaṇamāha-jānato akṛtatāṃ vidheḥ upasaṃpado aprarūḍhatāṃ vā dvitīyāyāṃ saṃghena sārdhaṃ karmaṇaḥ pratyanubhūtatāyāṃ
V03bsu058_u:11_109: upasaṃpadgato yo vidhiḥ jñaptyādikaḥ tasya akṛtatvaṃ jānataḥ,
V03bsu058_u:11_110: kṛtatve 'pi arūḍhatāṃ, yadyapi vidhikṛto na tūpasaṃpadrūḍhaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:11_112: saṃghena sārdhaṃ dvitīyasya karmaṇaḥ pratyanubhave tattvaṃ iti steyasaṃvāsikatvam /
V03bsu058_u:11_113: / nanūktam - 'yataścopālin, prakṛtisthaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ dve trīṇi vā poṣadhakarmāṇi pratyanubhūtāni bhavanti iyatā steya-saṃvāsika' iti /
V03bsu058_u:11_114: atha kasmāt 'trīṇi vā' ityetanna sūtritam? - yato naitanniyamakāri vacanam,
V03bsu058_u:11_117: itarathā dve iti asya vyavasthānasya 'trīṇi vā' ityetad ucchvāsa iti vijñāyate /
V03bsu058_u:11_120: / atra ca grantho 'pi / kathāvastuni syāt, yena vastunā steyasaṃvāsiko na pravrājayitavyo nopasaṃpādayitavyaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:11_121: tenaiva vastunā pravrājayitavyaḥ upasaṃpādayitavya syāt [iti cet] āha - yena dvau trayo vā poṣadhāḥ pratyanubhūtā bhavanti,
V03bsu058_u:11_123: yena tu sakṛtpoṣadhaḥ anubhūto bhavati ayaṃ pravrājayitavya upasaṃpādayitavyaśceti,
V03bsu058_u:11_124: na hi anyathā ekaṃśena, dvayapratyanubhavena arhatvam /
V03bsu058_u:11_125: / yuktiḥ punaḥ yasmādatra prathamaṃ pravartamānaḥ sāśaṃko bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:11_126: nāsya tasmin mithyātvaṃ prakṛtitāṃ gataṃ bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:11_128: atra poṣadhagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam, tadeha kasmāt aviśeṣeṇa sarvakarmapratyanubhāvaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:11_130: yat poṣadhe tulyaṃ vā anyeṣāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃghābhiniśrayatvam /
V03bsu058_u:11_133: jñapticaturthena karmaṇā anupasaṃpanne saṃghakarmaṇi poṣadhe vā pravāraṇāyāṃ vā dvādaśapudgalo ddīṣṭānubhūtiḥ,
V03bsu058_u:11_135: yāvat anupasaṃpannena akaraṇīyānulakṣitaṃ saṃghasya pravrajyā 'rocanādi tad sarvasaṃghāghīnatvāt [saṃgha?] karmapakṣatvam /
V03bsu058_u:11_137: yadi tasya pravrajyā 'rocana-śrāmaṇeratvopapatti-rahonuśāsana pāriśuddhi saṃgraha-parivāsādyārocanānāṃ anuprāptīnāṃ api pratyanubhūtasya steyasaṃvāsikatvaṃ vyavasthitam /
V03bsu058_u:11_139: / tatsvarūpaparijñāpanārtham - (136) samāttedaṃ-pravrajyasya taddṛṣṭeḥ nikṣipyedaṃ cīvaraṃ tena dhvajena tatrāruṇodgamane tattvam /
V03bsu058_u:11_140: / ityuktam / samāttedaṃ pravrajyasya iti samādānena pravrajyā asya,
V03bsu058_u:11_142: asyāṃ sthitaḥ taddṛṣṭikaḥ / cīvaramidaṃ nikṣipya iti sugatabhikṣuveṣaṃ utsṛjya /
V03bsu058_u:11_147: / tathāgataveṣamutkṣipya abhikāṃkṣitasya tīrthikasya abhikāṃkṣitaliṅgena ācchādya uṣite aruṇodgamanaṃ iti /
V03bsu058_u:11_149: na tīrthikadṛṣṭiḥ / idaṃ tadakṛtam // paścāt imasminnakṛte anyathāpi tīrthikagatatvaṃ bhavati cet,
V03bsu058_u:11_150: tadyathā steyavat // steyasyā 'pi antarbhūtam(?) tato anubhūtidvayamityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_152: / (138-145) mātṛghātakaḥ // pitṛghātakaḥ // arhadghātakaḥ // saṃghabhedakaḥ // tathāgatasyāntike duṣṭacittena rudhirotpādakaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_153: / bhikṣuṇīdūṣakaḥ // caturṇāṃ pārājikānāṃ anyatamāmāpattiṃ āpannaḥ [na veti] /
V03bsu058_u:11_154: / na abhyupagato nimittaviparyayaṃ praṇihitaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ akaraṇam /
V03bsu058_u:11_155: / iti nimittaviparyayaḥ iti yena nimittena kalahavivādādinā tarjanīyādi iṣṭakarmakaraṇaṃ bhavati tasya viparyayaḥ kalahavivādādyabhāvaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_159: na kṣāntiriti kṣāntikāryam / 'bhadantāḥ bhikṣavaḥ, tarjanīyakarmaṇaḥ tāvat upasaṃpatkaraṇe upasaṃpaditikaraṇaṃ anupasaṃpaditi vā karaṇaṃ (iti) [VinSū_24] upamaṇḍalopasaṃpad uktā /
V03bsu058_u:11_163: sāmagrī punaḥ praṇidhānam // iti upasaṃpadaḥ kalahākaraṇatvādi nimittaviparyaye anupapannaḥ cet sāmagryāṃ punaḥ karma kartavyamityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:11_164: / (148) adarśanoktau mṛṣā cet, prāyaścittikam // iti āpattiḥ mayā na dṛṣṭā iti mṛṣoktau āpattikaraṇe asya prāyaścittikam /
V03bsu058_u:12_2: khañjaḥ kāṇḍarikaḥ kāṇaḥ kuṇiḥ kubjo 'tha vāmanaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:12_8: ākhyātā satyanāmnā vai saṃbuddhena prajānatā // iti //
V03bsu058_u:13_0: hastacchinā iti maṇibandhamudgṛhya yeṣāṃ hastāḥ chinnāḥ /
V03bsu058_u:13_1: / pādacchinnā iti yeṣāṃ āgulphaṃ chedaḥ te pādacchinnāḥ /
V03bsu058_u:13_11: / kāṇaḥ ekākṣaḥ // kuṇiḥ yasya maṇibandhapakṣe cihnamātrahaste sati kiñcidapi karaṇe asamarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:13_13: / mūkaḥ vāgasamarthaḥ // pīṭhasarpi iti ādhārārthaṃ hastadvayaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya caturūpeṇa sarpati /
V03bsu058_u:13_17: / tathaiva akṣamabhāradhāraṇāt [VinSū_25] mārgagamanātiśayatvāt ca yathānukrameṇa bhāracchinnā mārgacchinnāśca /
V03bsu058_u:13_19: / kecidevaṃ vadanti - ye niruddhakramaṇena hatagranthitvāt gamanāvarodhena iva parikramākāriṇaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:13_20: ye ca yuvānaḥ karṣāntarvyāṃdhyādibhiḥ tathaiva asamarthitāḥ aparyantāḥ,
V03bsu058_u:13_21: prabalajīrṇatayā ca upakliṣṭa -?-sadṛśāḥ sarvakāryeṣu asamarthāḥ te kandalīcchinnā iva,
V03bsu058_u:15_2: upasaṃpādakairapi rājabhaṭaḥ rājñā 'nanujñātaḥ adūradeśikaḥ na pravrājayitavyaḥ upasaṃpādayitavyaśca iti /
V03bsu058_u:15_3: / yaḥ pravrajyāvastumārgaṃ gṛhṇāti tasmai etena upadeṣṭavyam /
V03bsu058_u:15_5: tena yena kenacit mārṣeṃṇa vā tatpadasaṃbaddhaḥ sa atra adūradeśikaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:15_6: / (150) kṛt* cauro prajñātaḥ // iti rājñā nā 'nanujñātaḥ adūradeśikaḥ ityetannirākaraṇārtha punaḥ kṛcchabdaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:15_7: cauro] nāsi dhvajabaddhakaḥ iti pravrajyārthaṃ upasaṃkrāntaḥ pṛcchet upasaṃpādakāśca,
V03bsu058_u:15_11: yatra yasya na prajñāyamānatvaṃ na tatra tasya dhvajabaddhakatvam /
V03bsu058_u:15_13: / rathakāraḥ carmakāraḥ, tadvidhān iti abhokṣya-[anu]śrāmaṇeratvaśikṣamāṇatva-upasaṃpādanā 'narhatvaṃ rathakārādīnāṃ apravrājane nimittam /
V03bsu058_u:15_16: / yadetad pravrajyāvastuni hastacchinna-pādacchinnetyādi uktaṃ nidarśanaṃ tadveditavyam,
V03bsu058_u:15_17: na parisaṃkhyānam / yeṣāmetad nidarśanaṃ tānīdānīṃ upanyasyati-
V03bsu058_u:17_0: tamiti hastacchinnāḥ pādachinnāḥ ityevamādikaṃ pratikṣepaṃ evaṃ vidhānāmapi pradhārayet ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_1: / haridrā iva raktā keśā yeṣāṃ te haridrakeśāḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_2: siṃhakeśā harikeśā // nīlyā iva raktā keśā yeṣāṃ haritakeśāḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_3: / janmanā eva śuklā keṣā yesāṃ te avadātakeśā,
V03bsu058_u:17_4: na tu palitinaḥ // hastina iva yeṣāṃ keśā te nāgakeśā /
V03bsu058_u:17_5: / tāmrabhājanamiva ślakṣṇaṃ vigatakeśaśiro yeṣāṃ te akeśakāḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_6: / yasya śirasi tasraḥ catasro vā sthūlavalayaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:17_7: yābhiḥ nimnonnataṃ lakṣyate, sa ghāṭośiraḥ // yeṣāṃ piśvitamiva śarīraṃ vaipulavataḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_10: / śiraso 'ntaḥ praviṣṭatvāt skandhasthāne akṣiṇī yasya asau skandhākṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_11: / lāṅgūlaṃ yasya prasravakaraṇaṃ ta[d yasya chinnaṃ] sa lāṅgūlachinnaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_14: ye evaṃvidhā varṇaviśeṣāḥ teṣāṃ eva pratikṣepaḥ na tu ye devānāmiva praśasyarūpāḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_16: pravrajitopasaṃpannānāmeṣāṃ api saṃgraho na ityu padarśanāya āha /
V03bsu058_u:17_19: hastacchinnādikaṃ varṇataḥ saṃsthānato vā kāyena [VinSū_27] duṣṭaṃ /
V03bsu058_u:17_20: nopasthāpayet, vāsasthāne 'pi antardāne, na anuparivāritvena ca, na kevalaṃ niśrayadāne / tathā ca bhikṣuṇā parṣad dūṣakaparṣad,
V03bsu058_u:17_22: ityuktvā kiyatā parṣad dū[ṣakā] parṣad iti vaktavyā? /
V03bsu058_u:17_23: jātito varṇasaṃsthānena ca // kathaṃ jātitaḥ? / rathakāracaṇḍālapukkasakulāt /
V03bsu058_u:17_25: / (154) yujyate naikasyopādhyāyasya ekena vacasā upasaṃpādanaṃ ātrayāt /
V03bsu058_u:17_26: anekasyeti dviprabhṛteḥ / eka upādhyāyaḥ asyeti ekopādhyāyaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:17_28: ki yato 'nekasya ityāha / ātrayāt* tribhyo yāvat yujyate,
V03bsu058_u:17_30_0: / kecit - aṃgīkṛtopādhyāyabhedaṃ atra granthaṃ kurvate - 'labhyaṃ bhadanta ekakāle ekakṣaṇe ekena karmakārakeṇa ekayā jñaptyā
V03bsu058_u:17_30_1: dvābhyāṃ karmāṇi kartum? kṛtāni ca vaktavyāni? na ca saṃghaḥ tena sā tisāro bhavati'? - 'labhyaṃ upālin sa cet karmakārako
V03bsu058_u:17_31: upādhyāyānāṃ nāmaparikīrtanaṃ kartuṃ upasaṃpatprekṣāṇāṃ ca jñaptiṃ ca na hāpayati karma ca karoti' ityādi /
V03bsu058_u:17_32: / ārya-upālino dāsakaḥ pālakaśca śrāmaṇerakau sapremakau gatau,
V03bsu058_u:17_36: asmānnidānāt ekopādhyāyasya anekasyāṅgīkaraṇaṃ atra nidānāt dṛśyate /
V03bsu058_u:17_40: pṛthagvā upasaṃpannānāṃ, yeṣāṃ tulyasamayaḥ tesāṃ sāmīcīkaraṇasya parasparaṃ abhāvaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_41: sāmīcī vandanā // (156) saṃprāpte prāthamyam // tulyasamayānāṃ lābhakarmādānoddeśādi sthānaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:17_42: yaḥ prathamaṃ saṃprāptaḥ 'yathāgatikayā lābho grahītavyaḥ' iti vacanāt tasya lābhagrahaṇe prāthamyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_43: / karmādāne yaḥ paścādāgataḥ tena pūrvakarma kartavyam paścādāgataḥ karmādāne prathamaṃ iti vacanāt /
V03bsu058_u:17_49: / arvāgbhāvaḥ arvāktvam / etasya dvyaṅgulasya arvāgbhāvāt ūrdhvaṃ dvyarghāṅgula pramāṇatā saṃprāptā /
V03bsu058_u:17_50: yāvanna dhārayitavyā ityatra jñānaṃ bhava[tīti veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_51: grantho ']tra - āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā dvyaṅgulā bālā dhārayitavyā,
V03bsu058_u:17_52: arvāk grāmāntikena iti // kecit - 'dvyaṅgulāvartā' iti dvyaṅgulasthāne adhīyate /
V03bsu058_u:17_53: yadyasya pāṭhasya dvyaṅgulapramāṇa āvarto yeṣāṃ ityarthaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:17_57: asya yena ca nidānadoṣe śikṣā padaṃ prajñaptaṃ taddoṣāpātasya ca tadavasthatvāt /
V03bsu058_u:17_62: / muktvā vraṇasāmantakam // na cūḍāṃ kārayet // na saṃbādhi-[pradeśe]romakarma kārayet /
V03bsu058_u:17_63: / iti // na kārayediti anuṣaṅgaḥ / saṃbādha-pradeśo guhyasthānam /
V03bsu058_u:17_64: / (163) kārayet* vraṇanimittaṃ arūḍhau anyathā vijñān sthavirasthavirān avalokyeti /
V03bsu058_u:17_67: sūtradhara-vinayadhara-mātṛkāḍharān bhikśūn āpṛṣṭvā saṃbādhaśmaśru kārayitavyam' ityatra
V03bsu058_u:17_68: granthaḥ // tatra nidarśanametad, śocanavidhānaṃ yujyate iti prakārāntarāṇyapi cikitsitasya avaruddhāni,
V03bsu058_u:17_69: sthavirasthavirān bhikṣūnavalokya vraṇanimittaṃ prāṇakanimittaṃ vā saṃbādhe pradeśe romakarma kārayitavyamiti /
V03bsu058_u:17_70: apareṣāṃ atra granthaḥ, tatra pramukhaviditaṃ kṛtamiti etadavalokanam /
V03bsu058_u:17_71: dvābhyāṃ ca vṛddhābhyāṃ pramukhatvaṃ śīlato dharmavinayābhijñatayā ca,
V03bsu058_u:17_72: ityubhayamapi etad avalokyagataṃ saṃgṛhītam vijñātaṃ tatra /
V03bsu058_u:17_75: na yūkādyabhiprāyam / asya ca vraṇanimittatvenaiva antaḥkṛtatvamiti na gṛhītam /
V03bsu058_u:17_78: jaṅdhāmuṇḍanaṃ aṅganāḍī // (165) na anyatra kāye // iti // saṃbādha-aṅganāḍībhyāṃ anyatra kāye grīvātaḥ prabhṛti yaḥ kāyānuvyavahāraḥ tatra eṣa romakarma-pratiṣedhaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_80: nāsāromṇaḥ śātanasya abhūdvacanaṃ iti prasiddhe pratyayaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_81: / mātṛkāyāmatra granthaḥ - keśaśmaśrū sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣu aṃgapratyaṃgeṣu roma na śātayitavyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_82: yaḥ śātayet* duṣkṛtaḥ syāt āpattiḥ iti /
V03bsu058_u:17_83: / (166-168) kṣuradhārakaṃ vā nakhacchedaṃ bhajeta vāsīmukhaṃ vā /
V03bsu058_u:17_84: naiṣāṃ mṛṣṭiṃ bhajet // bhajeta lekhaṃ malāvakṛṣṭyai /
V03bsu058_u:17_87: na antarvāsasaḥ / sarvasya ca na saṃghāṭi-uttarāsaṃgayoḥ eva /
V03bsu058_u:17_93: pratigṛhyante anena keśāḥ iti tu niruktiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_94: cīvaramiti kuta etad, 'cīvaraṃ keśapratigrahanaṃ adhiṣṭhānaṃ' iti adhiṣṭhānamantre vacanāt /
V03bsu058_u:17_95: kathaṃ puna etad vijñāyate prāvaraṇārthamiti? na punaḥ tatraiva keśānāmavatāraṇārthamiti /
V03bsu058_u:17_96: abhāve saṃkakṣikābhidhānāt / apratikṣepaṃ hi saṃkakṣikāyāṃ keśāvatāraṇam /
V03bsu058_u:17_98: / keśapratigrahaṇasya cīvarasyābhāve saṃkakṣikayā āvṛtayā keśaśmaśrū avatārayet /
V03bsu058_u:17_99: / (171) na saṃstare / iti na keśaśmaśrū avatārayet /
V03bsu058_u:17_100: nidāneṣvapi ādāveva nakhacchedanam iti etadante granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_102: / iti vihārādhikārikametad // (173-174) avatārayeta prāsādādau jīrṇo glāno vā vātātapavarṣeṣu ca /
V03bsu058_u:17_107: / (176) evaṃ nakhacchedanam // na saṃstare ityādeḥ eṣo 'tideśaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_108: keśapratigrahe nipuṇagrāhiṇī kriyamāṇā bhūmau kṛtā bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:17_112: / (177) na anadhiṣṭhitā bhikṣuṇī eṣā purūṣeṇāvītarāgā keśāṃśchedayet /
V03bsu058_u:17_113: / eṣā iti bhikṣuṇī avītarāgā iti 'anāpattiryadi vītarāgā syāt' ityatra granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_115_0: atha mahāprajāpatī gautamī pañcabhiḥ śākyāyanikāśataiḥ sārdhaṃ svayameva keśāṃśchedayitvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇī ācchādya iti
V03bsu058_u:17_115_1: keśacchedanasya uktasya '[evameva tvaṃ gautamī muṇḍā śobhanā]' iti muṇḍātvena abhidhānāt;
V03bsu058_u:17_117: anyatra anuvyavahāraḥ - avītarāgā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇyā anadhiṣṭhitā na [puruṣeṇa] keśāṃśchedayet ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_118: / (178) saṃrajyamānāṃ adhiṣṭhātrī samanuśiṣyāt - 'smṛtimupasthāpaya kimasmin kalevare sāramasti' iti /
V03bsu058_u:17_126: / satyapi pānīyasya saṃbhave, kalpata evaitad - 'bhikṣuṇā keśapratigrahaṇaṃ dhārayitavyam,
V03bsu058_u:17_127: snātavyaṃ vā, antato hastapādā prakṣālayativyāḥ' ityatra granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_128: / (182) na nagnaṃ snāyāt iti / trimaṇḍalācchāditatve paripūrṇaṃ anagnatvam /
V03bsu058_u:17_130: tāvat chāditatvena sarvasya (aparasya) aparihartavyatā iti etad atra sāmarthyāt gantavyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_132: na strītīrthe cūrṇena iti // puruṣatīrthe bhikṣaṇyāḥ snānasya eva pratiṣedhaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_137: / bhagavānāha - na bhikṣuṇyā strītīrthe cūrṇena snātavyam' ityatra granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_141: / iti, 'kalpayate' ityanuṣaṅgaḥ // (187) na bhikṣuṇī yoṣiti cūrṇaṃ kṣipet /
V03bsu058_u:17_142: / snānakāle api anyadā 'pīti-viśeṣāparigrahāt pratipattiḥ nagna (tva)-parihāraprasaṃgena ucyate /
V03bsu058_u:17_144: / nivasitasya vāsasaḥ pūrvapaścimādhastyaḥ adhastādbhavāntaḥ agrathito yena ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_148: āpadi adhirohe yatpratīkārārthaṃ yo 'dhirohaḥ tasya cet nivasanasyaiva grathanenoparodhaḥ anurakṣyatvamasya /
V03bsu058_u:17_150: / (189) na anyadā evaṃ syāt // niśrayaṇyadhirohaṇād anyasminkāle na grathitādhastyapūrvapaścima nivasitāntena [sāmīcīsthitena] bhavitavyamityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_151: antarmukhasya kaupīnapakṣatvaṃ iti tannāgnyasya atra pradeśe pariharaṇamucyate /
V03bsu058_u:17_153: / apraticchannasya vastrādinā yā avṛtiḥ apraticchannavaktrāya avṛtistāṃ na bhajet /
V03bsu058_u:17_154: 'vijṛṃbhamāṇena bhikṣuṇā hastena mukhaṃ pratichādayitavyam' ityatra granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_156: / vijṛṃbhaṇaṃ ca kāmakāro yadvidhāraṇaṃ pratītamadhikṛtya etadevamuktam /
V03bsu058_u:17_157: asati āśaktau yadapāvaraṇaṃ na tadbhajane doṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_159: / āsaktiḥ dvipuṭe prāṇakānām / saktiriti vaktavyaṃ granthacchāyāyāṃ saṃpattyarthaṃ ā-iti upādānam /
V03bsu058_u:17_160: kāraṇādeśametad / yasmāt saktiḥ dvipuṭe vāsasi prāṇakānāṃ,
V03bsu058_u:17_163: grantho 'tra - “bhagavānāha - traicīvarikeṇa bhikṣuṇā snātraśātako dhārayitavyaḥ” iti /
V03bsu058_u:17_165: tadyuktam / snātraśāṭakaṃ sametya anutpādite saṃkalpe naiḥsargikasya utthānāt niyataṃ eṣa saṃkalpo 'tra utpādayitavyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_166: asya cotpādane jātaṃ bhavati atra mānasasya adhiṣṭhānasya kartavyattvam /
V03bsu058_u:17_168: sukaratvāt vācikasya asmādeva anujñānāt na anenāsya samādānamraṃśo bhavatīti veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_171: / sarve na traicīvarikā eva / [atra granthaḥ] - apareṣāṃ snātraśāṭakasya prāptirnāsti,
V03bsu058_u:17_172: bhagavānāha - taiḥ patrāṇi purataḥ pṛṣṭhataśca datvā pratigupte pradeśe snātavyamiti aviśeṣeṇa etadabhihitam /
V03bsu058_u:17_174: / ekapuṭāt atyāsaktiḥ dvipuṭe prāṇakānāmiti ataḥ pratipattiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_176: tasmāt nānena saprāṇake 'mbhasi snātavyamityatra sthitaṃ veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_178: / vihāre cediti etad snānaṃ kriyate udakabhrama eva kartavyaṃ nānyatra /
V03bsu058_u:17_180: / iti pādaprakṣālanādikasya dravasya udakabhrama eva cchoraṇaṃ nānyatra /
V03bsu058_u:17_185: / syandanikā bhavati, bhagavānāha, kālānukālaṃ śocayitavyā / api tu udakabhrame eva snātavyamiti,
V03bsu058_u:17_187: / syandanikāyā ityanubandhaḥ / snātiḥ snānam / syaṃdanikā iti pratividheḥ ākhyānametad /
V03bsu058_u:17_189: na tu bhrame eva snātavyamiti niyamabhūtaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:17_190: snānārthatvāt śālikāyāḥ // (202) neṭṭanodgharṣeṇa kāyaṃ śodhayet pādābhyāmanyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_191: / na iṭṭanena bhikṣuṇā kāyo gharṣitavyaḥ iti granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_192: anyamiti pādavyatiriktam / tayoḥ tu apratiṣedhaḥ // (203) nidarśanametad tīkṣṇaśauṭīrayoḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_195: ājñaptaṃ bhagavatā - na iṭṭanena kāyo ghṛṣitavya iti /
V03bsu058_u:17_196: bhikṣavaḥ śuktyā ghṛṣanti, bhagavānāha - muṇḍaśuktiḥ karanīyā ityatra granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_198: tasmāt nidarśanaṃ iṭṭanam / anyasyāpi tīkṣṇasya śauṭīrasya ca dravyasya tenā pi kāyo no ghṛṣitavyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_201: anyathā śukternāśāt // (205) na kiñcitkenacit āmuṣṭicailavartte(ḥ) bhikṣuṇī uddhṛṣet /
V03bsu058_u:17_202: / na kiṃciditi kāyam, mṛduṣtrīśarīram, mṛduślakṣṇādapi tasmin vikārasya saṃpattiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_203: sunikṛṣṭenāpi etatkaraṇe striyaḥ sauṭīrapitatvamiti bhikṣuṇīṣu sarvapratiṣedhaḥ bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:17_204: sukumārāntaraṃ vastramiti, muṣṭimātratvena uktvā cailavartteḥ vacanam /
V03bsu058_u:17_207: tasmādeṣāṃ udakaṃ anapagataṃ yasya iti gatiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_210: / abhāve muhūrttaṃ utkuṭukena sthitvā snātraśāṭakena proñchanamiti /
V03bsu058_u:17_211: / yāvatā vā anena saṃpannena snātraśāṭakaproñchanārthasaṃpattiḥ tāvatā 'sya yāvatyā kālamātrayā saṃpattiḥ tadupalakṣaṇamatra muhūrtaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_212: stokasya vā yasya tasya muhūrtamiti abhidhānametad /
V03bsu058_u:17_213: utkuṭukena sthitvā iti evaṃ āśu-apagamasya ambhasaḥ kāyāt saṃpattiḥ guptarūpaṃ caitadavasthānam /
V03bsu058_u:17_219: / ityatra granthaḥ - 'saṃpadyate anyapradeśe gatādapi ato aparipūrṇārthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_222: tatra karaṇḍe yatkartavyaṃ taddarśanārthamāha - (211) vahiḥ saṃvṛttasya antarviśālasya samudrākṛteḥ vātāyanasya mokṣo madhye /
V03bsu058_u:17_227: / tena ajapadakena daṇḍena vātāyane sūcī praveśyate niṣkāsyate /
V03bsu058_u:17_236: / jentākaśālāyām // (220) tamikānutpattaye saktūnāṃ kaṭutailamrakṣitānāṃ aganau prakṣepaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_240: / āmalakapiṇḍikayā ca / kakṣapiṇḍiko 'tra āsanam // atra jentāke kakṣapiṇḍakāsanam /
V03bsu058_u:17_241: nāsya snehena āsanārtham, ityasya anujñānam // (224) tṛṇairbhūmerāstaranaṃ ādraiḥ,
V03bsu058_u:17_246: / cidreṇa upanibadhya sūtrakeṇa asyāḥ sthāpanaṃ upadhivārikeṇa gupte pradeśe
V03bsu058_u:17_248: / asnānaṃ tatra // tatra iti jantāke // (229) śālāyāḥ tadartha karaṇam /
V03bsu058_u:17_249: / tadarthamiti snānārtham // (230) anāśāya snapayanacīvarāṇāṃ iṣṭakābaddhagarta karaṇam /
V03bsu058_u:17_250: / [snapayanacī]varāṇāṃ anāśārthaṃ garte avatīrṇena snānaṃ uttamasthena udakadānam /
V03bsu058_u:17_251: ityataḥ āpannaṃ veditavyam // (231) udakabhramasya asya mokṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_252: / asya iti gartasya // (232) śiṣṭānāṃ atyuṣṇatāyāṃ jalasya ārocanamiti /
V03bsu058_u:17_253: uṣṇaṃ udakaṃ ityavetya pariśiṣṭānāṃ pravrajitānāṃ ārocayet ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_254: / (233) śītenāsya bhedaḥ iti // uṣṇasya ambhasaḥ // (234) sekādau api // sekādyartha mapi śītena asya bhedaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_257: madhyapātena pratyupatiṣthamānaṃ [VinSū_33] ajñātaṃ atraitadgato nirjñānārthaṃ pṛccheta /
V03bsu058_u:17_261: etadgata iti jentākagataḥ / kimayaṃ bhikṣuḥ uta ājīvikādiḥ iti [nirjñānārthaṃ] pṛcchet /
V03bsu058_u:17_262: / dvārapālasya etadarthaṃ sthāpanam iti ajñātasya madhyapātena pratyupatiṣṭhamānasya nirjñānāya praśnārthaṃ apraveśārthaṃ ca iti /
V03bsu058_u:17_271: / atra iti jentāke // (242) navakeriti aparamiti // matāntarasyaitatpradarśanam /
V03bsu058_u:17_272: keṣāṃcit pāthāntaram / navakaiḥ parikarma jantāke kartavyamiti /
V03bsu058_u:17_276: iti sārdhaṃ-vihāryantevāsināṃ udvarttanādeḥ parikarmaṇaḥ parasparaṃ karaṇam /
V03bsu058_u:17_278: / ityādi śabdaira (pekṣitasya? ) parikarmaṇaḥ saṃgrahamātṛkāyāṃ “etadādinā agrataḥ sthitvā “vitapet” ityantam /
V03bsu058_u:17_283: anyatra tu jentakāntān / vidhānārthametatsūtram - / (248) alpaśabdo 'tra praviśet /
V03bsu058_u:17_285: susaṃvṛtaḥ svīryaśca kāyavācoḥ avikṣepaṃ susaṃvṛtteyatvena darśayati /
V03bsu058_u:17_289: / na paraṃ vitapaṃtaṃ vyavadhāya ātmanā vitapedityarthaḥ
V03bsu058_u:17_290: // (252) saṃgaṇikāvarjanamiti // atreti vartate, kāmānuguṇaṃ pratipadya jentāke vṛttaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:17_291: 'saṃdīpikā ca kāmānāṃ saṃgaṇikā' iti ato 'syā varjanaṃ atra viśeṣataḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_298: na bhikṣubhiḥ jentāke ekacīvaraiḥ parasparaṃ parikarma kartavyamiti /
V03bsu058_u:17_299: sarvatra parikarmaṇi na kāyagata eva sarvatra ca sthāne,
V03bsu058_u:17_300: [VinSū_34] na jentāke eva asya vidheḥ vyavatiṣṭhamānatā,
V03bsu058_u:17_301: iti tannāśritam // (256) naitad kāyasya aśraddhena kārayet /
V03bsu058_u:17_302: / 'etad' iti parikarma, yad [bāhyaṃ] bhārodvahanādikaṃ karma na pratiṣidhyate /
V03bsu058_u:17_303: / (257) anitvarā atra pūrvatra ca śraddhā abhisaṃhitā /
V03bsu058_u:17_304: / 'anitvarā' iti cirakālotpattyā yā aniṣkampā sā anitvarā /
V03bsu058_u:17_306: 'pūrvatra ca' iti 'nāśraddhasya atra praveśaṃ dadyāt' ityatra /
V03bsu058_u:17_314: / [glānaḥ] / atra nidānaṃ paṭhyate / glāna-grahaṇaṃ prajñaptau na kṛtam,
V03bsu058_u:17_320: / vṛṃhaṇaṃ snāne 'rthaḥ / ityeṣāṃ atra aṅgatvam / kathaṃ snānamityāha - // (263-264) abhyakṣā 'rūkṣatārtham /
V03bsu058_u:17_325: dvau trayo vā snehabindavaḥ paścime udakumbhe deyāḥ ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_326: / (266) snāyāt ayodroṇikāyām / dhārayedenāṃ glānaḥ iti // enāmiti ayodroṇikām / dharaṇaṃ aglānena asyāḥ na yujyate,
V03bsu058_u:17_327: na upayojanaṃ ayaspiṇḍavat, ityasya pratipattavyam / [au]ddhatyaṃ evaṃ-jātīyakasya vinārthena karaṇam,
V03bsu058_u:17_328: tacca sarvaṃ duṣkṛtamiti gamyamānatvāt na sūtritam /
V03bsu058_u:17_332: / dadyāt iti vartate / avilaṃbitamatra snānam, aduḥkhanārtham / ato asyāḥ dānam // (269) na yatra kva cana pādau prakṣālayet /
V03bsu058_u:17_338: iti kāmakāro 'tra, na niyamaḥ iti saṃdarśanārtham ādau kriyāpadasya prayogaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_340: na ca sāṃghike vastuni ekasya prasaṃgaḥ iti bahuvacanam /
V03bsu058_u:17_348: aluṭhanamatra arthaḥ / karṇikāvanta miti dhāvyamānapādāvasthānārthaṃ etatkaraṇam /
V03bsu058_u:17_350: / (276) madhye saṃniviṣṭayā / kimākārayā ityāha - // (277) kadambapuṣpākārayā kharayā ca /
V03bsu058_u:17_354: nairmalyaṃ prāsādikatvam / na cāsya yad tatra śaucodakaṃ avatiṣṭhate /
V03bsu058_u:17_355: tataḥ na saṃpattiḥ, tasmāt anyenāmbhasā iti mantavyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_356: 'pādau prakṣālya bahirvihārasya pranāḍīmukhe vā pādodakaṃ chorayitvā punaḥ prakṣālya' ityatra granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_362: ākāreṇeti vartate / kena pralepanamityāha - // (283) gomayena mṛdā vā // [ityucyate] // (284) na vidyate ratnārthatāyāṃ pralipteḥ ākārasya [niyamaḥ] /
V03bsu058_u:17_364: / nonena adhikena pāṇḍunā vā / trīṇi pātrāṇi, jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ kanīya iti /
V03bsu058_u:17_365: ucyate - // (288) śeṣeṇa ūrdhvabhāgānta-anantarāt aṃguṣṭhodarāt pakvataṇḍulaprasthasya ūrdhvaṃ vā,
V03bsu058_u:17_369: yad aṃguṣṭhodaraṃ, parvapradeśe yā aṃguṣṭhasya pṛthutā,
V03bsu058_u:17_370: tanmātram / tataḥ śeṣeṇādhareṇa [aṃśena] prasthaṃ vā pakkānāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ māgadhakaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:17_376: / tataḥ, ṣoḍaśānāṃ atra palānāṃ māgadhakena prasthena abhidhānaṃ iti pratipattavyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_377: / “yatra dvau māgadhakau pakkataṇḍulaprasthau sasūpavyaṃjanau prakṣiptau aṅguṣṭhodareṇa tittikaṃ na spṛśataḥ tad jyeṣṭham /
V03bsu058_u:17_378: yatraikaḥ tatkanīyo, atrāntarāt madhyam / “ ityatra granthaḥ / vyaṃjanīyārthatvena atra sūpavyaṃjanayoḥ grahaṇāt bhāgaśaḥ sūpavyaṃjanayoḥ atra temanatvaṃ iti śritam,
V03bsu058_u:17_382: na pareṇa ityarthaḥ / palasya deśabhedena hīna-madhya-utkṛṣṭa-sāṃkaryadoṣavyudāsārtha āmnāyāgataṃ pramāṇamucyate /
V03bsu058_u:17_384: palaṃ tvaṣṭasuvarṇakam” // (289) na bhikṣuṇī ūrdhvaṃ bhikṣukanīyasaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_385: dhārayet // yad bhikṣūṇāṃ kanīyaḥ tadasyāḥ jeṣṭham /
V03bsu058_u:17_388: anayā iti bhikṣuṇyā / atra iti pātre / yena pradeśena asya niṣādo bhūmau tiṣṭhāpanaṃ sastu niṣādaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:17_389: tatra ityarthaḥ / kimākārasya ityāha - // (291) bodhivaṭapatrakasya pāṇitalakasya vā (292) parimāṇaśca /
V03bsu058_u:17_390: / na kevalaṃ ākārataḥ parimāṇato 'pi etāvadeva etaddeyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_392: monasaṃpatteḥ ityarthaḥ / bhūsparśe koṭaka-alaganaṃ atra etad dāne 'rthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_396: / “na varṣāsu apātrākaḥ syāt” - ityevamādikaṃ atikrāntaṃ bhavati ityasyaitatkaraṇam /
V03bsu058_u:17_397: / (294) tadvatpañcakam // tricīvaraṃ, niṣadanaṃ, pariśrāvaṇaṃ ca yathāpātreṇa bhavati sa-tattvaṃ evamanenāpi ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_398: / “tasmāt anujānāmi yācitakairapi ṣaḍbhiḥ pariṣkāraiḥ pravrājayitavyam” ityatra granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_399: parisrāvaṇa-niṣadanābhyāṃ api vinā na pravrajayitavyaṃ iti [tritayam] /
V03bsu058_u:17_400: ataḥ āpannaṃ veditavyam // (295-296-297) na varṣāsu apātrakaḥ syāt /
V03bsu058_u:17_401: / na janapadacārikaṃ caret // caret sabhayatāyāṃ kupātrakeṇa /
V03bsu058_u:17_403: sa bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ janapadacārikaṃ caran karvaṭakaṃ anuprāptaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_406: sa gṛhapatiḥ avadhyāyati bhagavānāha - 'na bhikṣuṇā pātreṇa vinā janapadacārikā caritavyā /
V03bsu058_u:17_408: pātraṃ sthāpayitavyam, varṣāsu pātraṃ upasthāpayitavyam' ityatra granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_410: / na utthitaḥ pātraṃ karṣayet, prakṣipet, śoṣayedvā // mātrayā paribhuṃjīta / tad-bhogapradarśanārthamāha - /
V03bsu058_u:17_417_0: / na savālukena go-śakṛtā // na atyārdraṃ pratiśāmayeta / nātiśuṣkaṃ adhyupekṣeta / na śilāyāṃ sthāpayet // tāvatkālikametad
V03bsu058_u:17_417_1: sthāpanam // (309) na aśucau pradeśe // (310) na yatra kva cana // pradeśa iti vartate sthāpanaṃ ca /
V03bsu058_u:17_418: / (311) nāsmin nikṣipet // yatra kva cana atināmanārthaṃ eṣa niṣedhaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:17_421: kathaṃ karaṇamityāha - // (313) uttiṣṭhatorvihāraparigaṇayoḥ na khananena bhitteḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_423: / pātrasthāpanārthakaraṇam / [VinSū_37] ākāśa-mālakamityasya pāṭhāntareṇa vyavahāraḥ kimmayasya ityāha - /
V03bsu058_u:17_427: / pidhānakamapi asya latāmayaṃ rajjumayaṃ ca āliptaṃ gomayamṛdā kartavyamityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_429: / na bhūmau sthāpanam // na enaṃ anyatra nayet // (iti) cakorakam // (321) prakṣiptaṃ sthavikāyāṃ nayet /
V03bsu058_u:17_430: / pātram // (322) na hastena iti nayet // (323) kakṣayā asya // iti pātrasya (324) nayanaṃ ālayanakaṃ dattvā /
V03bsu058_u:17_432: / anyasyāṃ pātraṃ, anyasyāṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ, anyasyāṃ lolāhalamityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_434: / (326) dhārayedenaḥ // iti pātrādisthavikāḥ // (327) na tulyāvalambanānāṃ āsu ālayanakānāṃ niveśaṃ upayuñjīta /
V03bsu058_u:17_435: / āsu iti pātrādisthavikāsu na-tulyabalambanānāṃ ālayanakā dātavyā ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_436: tathā ca “ārya, kimayaṃ mṛdaṅgaḥ” iti nidānam /
V03bsu058_u:17_444: pṛthaktvasya asya madhye, na dīrghasya iti arthāt gantavyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_447: / tvacamivasaṃghāṭim // śiṣṭaṃ ca cīvaraṃ ca // na pratisaṃskaraṇamupekṣeta /
V03bsu058_u:17_449: ubhayaṃ hi pātraṃ cīvaraṃ ca apekṣya etadvacanam /
V03bsu058_u:17_451: / nāpratigupta etad kriyamāṇaṃ aprasādavastu iti khyāpanārthaṃ etatsūtram /
V03bsu058_u:17_453: / chidrasyataditi // bandhanam // (339) na tu sādhu guḍa-jatu-siktha-trapu-sīsaiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_455: / (341) cūrṇikayā ca / lohasya pāṣāṇasya vā // bandhanaṃ sādhu iti anubandhaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_456: / (342) tailena dhṛṣṭiriti // cūrṇikayā / kuto yāvaditi āha - (343) āsiktha-sādṛśyāt /
V03bsu058_u:17_457: / kena dhṛṣṭiḥ ityāha - // (344) lohena kuruvindena vā /
V03bsu058_u:17_458: / anena [cūrṇikāyāḥ tailena ārdrīkṛtvā yāvat sikthasadṛśībhāvaḥ tā-[va]tdhṛṣṭirityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_459: / (345) uṣṇe dānamiti // pātre iti prakaraṇāt pratipattiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_462: pākasya dānam // ityanuṣaṅgaḥ / kīdṛśasya pākasya dānamityāha - /
V03bsu058_u:17_468: tasmāt śeṣasya ato 'tra sādhutvaṃ na ityāeḥ pūrvasyānuṣaṅgaḥ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ veditavyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_471: yena tapanārhatā, ityatra ucyate - // (349) bhujyamānatve pākyatvaṃ māsaṣaṭkānte /
V03bsu058_u:17_473: / (350) mārta cet pakṣasya // - ante pākyatvaṃ ityanuṣaṅgaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_476: / prāṇyupaghānamantareṇa [aśakyatāyāṃ] adeyatve varṣāsu pākasya adeyatve avasthite,
V03bsu058_u:17_477: yāpanasya etadākhyānam / dvayoḥ upayogakālayoḥ madhyaṃ kāryāntarālam /
V03bsu058_u:17_478: tatra asya pātrasya virūkṣaṇena mrakṣitattvena ca saṃyojyatvam /
V03bsu058_u:17_480: / aparatra kāryakāle virūkṣayitavyaṃ ityevametatsaṃyojanaṃ ityarthatvāt gantavyām /
V03bsu058_u:17_484: / tadarthamiti pākārtham / kīdṛśasyetyāha - // tattvotpatteḥ / tadbhāvatattve kaṭāhakatvena eva yasyotpattiḥ,
V03bsu058_u:17_487: kimasyaiva ekasya, na ityāha - // (355) tattvotpatteḥ karparakasya vā /
V03bsu058_u:17_488: / upasthāpanamityanubandhaḥ / yathāsya karparakāmena kaṭāhakasya saṃpādanārthaṃ sādhu ghaṭādeḥ bhedanakena [deśitatvāt] - /
V03bsu058_u:17_494: tadvidhaṃ etatkartavyaṃ yadvidheḥ dhūmo na palāyate ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_498: abhyantare kimadattena asya kasyacita dravyasya lepena ityāha - /
V03bsu058_u:17_501: / (361) upagataśoṣeṇa / kīdṛśyāṃ kimastarāyāṃ vā bhūmau nihitasya pātrasya anena avacchādanaṃ ityāha - /
V03bsu058_u:17_502: / (362) kṛtaparikarmāyāṃ bhūmau vā stṛtatuṣāyāṃ avakīrṇaṃ rūciradhūmakarakapiṇyākādidravyāyāṃ nihitasya adhobilam /
V03bsu058_u:17_513: / ambhasā sāmantakasyaiva / uktaṃ - 'na apātrakaṃ pravrājayeyuḥ' ityetatprasaṃgāgataṃ saparikaraṃ pātravidhānam /
V03bsu058_u:17_517: kasminpradeśe ityāha - / parivyaṃjanaṃ, vyaṃjanātsamantataḥ / ajñātau varṣāgrasya upāsaṃpādyasya aṃgīkaraṇam /
V03bsu058_u:17_518: aprajñāyamāne viṃśativarṣatve upasaṃpannibhittaṃ vyaṃjanasāmantakena romajanmano aṃgīkaraṇamityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_523: ucce nāgadantake cīvaravaṃśe 'vatiṣṭhato vastrādeḥ bhāvasya avatāraṇa-āropaṇādinā /
V03bsu058_u:17_529: tadarthaṃ vyāpṛtāt śāsanādhimuktāt śīlavataḥ ca bhikṣoḥ sopadhivāra-vihārasthānato gamane tanmārgapratipannāt /
V03bsu058_u:17_530: anyadā vihāra-taditikaraṇīya-caṃkramaṇa-atināmanasthānagatāt - (373) darśanopavicāra enaṃ apakāsane sthāpayeyuḥ ganābhimukhaṃ pragṛhītāṃjalim /
V03bsu058_u:17_531: / enamiti upasaṃpatprekṣam / apakāsana iti rahonuśāsakagatasya karmaṇo aśravathaṃ saṃghamadhyāt asya pṛthakjñāpanaṃ yattadatra apakāsanagrahaṇena gṛhītam /
V03bsu058_u:17_532: apakāsane gaṇābhimukhaṃ pragṛhītāñjalīḥ saṃghamadhyāt anapakāsito na kartavyaḥ ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_535: / niśrayāniti vartate / 'gṛhaniśritāya niśrayaṃ na ārocayet' - yāvat 'apravrajitāya' iti /
V03bsu058_u:17_536: asya paścāt ayaṃ granthaḥ - anyatamaḥ brāhmaṇadārakaḥ pravrajyopasaṃpadārthaṃ upādhyāyena yāvatpiṇḍapātaṃ gaccha iti ājñaptaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:17_537: tena ājñapte sati svabhikṣā(yācana) hetunā udvignaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:17_538: kiṃ pravrajitenā 'pi piṇḍapātaḥ kartavyaḥ iti śikṣāṃ pratiṣedhate,
V03bsu058_u:17_539: bhagavatā garhitvā uktam - “upasaṃpannamātrāya catvāraḥ niśrayā ārocayitavyāḥ” ityatra saṃgraho 'yam /
V03bsu058_u:17_540: / (376)yatra niśrayā 'bhāvaḥ tatra poṣadhopāsanā-niśrayapratijñā-grahaṇaṃ ca na kartavyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_542: / niśrayābhāve “pratijñāyāḥ pāścāt arthasiddhiḥ dṛśyate' (iti) etadvacanaṃ dṛṣṭam,
V03bsu058_u:17_543: tatra purvakasmin sati paścāt pratijñā kartavyā iti jñāyate,
V03bsu058_u:17_545: / paścāditi grahaṇam / dvimāsato 'dhikaṃ niśrayā 'bhāve na rakṣitavyam ityasya anupratiṣedhārthaṃ 'api'-śabdaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_546: dvimāsaṃ nāśrityāpi niśritaṃ kartavyaṃ ityatra jñātavyam /
V03bsu058_u:17_548: / evaṃ iti vastu, vastvādiparihāraiḥ enaṃ vastu parīccheyuḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_552_0: / abhāve iti niśrayasya / 'varṣāvāse aniśritaḥ' ityukte vacane niśritānāṃ madhye ekavarṣīyaṃ ācāryakālamatītya varṣā-vicchedāt
V03bsu058_u:17_552_1: vihāre aniśritya gatānāṃ vihāre anāśrayaḥ api na kartavyaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:17_553: kṛtvā tu sātisāro bhavati / atha ca yasteṣu ativṛddhaḥ sa praṣṭavyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_556: arthataḥ(?) tesāṃ vṛddhataro daharaḥ sa niśritaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_560: / iti niśraye / bhāve 'pi āśraya sya āśraye /
V03bsu058_u:17_563: ayameva tena praṣṭavyaḥ / ayameva tasya śikṣito bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:17_566: / (382) na anavalokya tajjātīyaṃ parikarmayet tena vā ātmānam /
V03bsu058_u:17_567: / atra tajjātīyaṃ nikāyāntara-pravrajitaṃ jñātaṃ āśaṃkitaṃ vā /
V03bsu058_u:17_569: / nirdoṣamiti nirapavādam / abhāve iti āśrayasya / nirapavādaḥ kasminniti cet - tadarthaṃ pravṛttapareṣaṇa ityādyuktam /
V03bsu058_u:17_575: / (385) arhatvaṃ ca lābhe // ityuktaṃ bhavati // tadapi apratihatasaṃbaṃdhe niśrayaparyeṣaṇe ceti /
V03bsu058_u:17_576: / (386-387) viśramya āgantuko dvitīye tṛtīye vā anhi niśrayaṃ gṛhṇīta /
V03bsu058_u:17_577: / na ekāhasya arthe // iti niśrayaṃ gṛhṇīta ityetena anubandhaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_579: / niśrayakṛtena 'niśritaḥ' / eṣa karmaṇi ka-(=ktaḥ) (pratyayaḥ) niśrayatvena grahaṇe ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_581: / karmādānanimittaṃ gatasya aparasya karmādānasya āgamane doṣābhāvo 'nāpṛṣṭau ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_586: / vṛttaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca parivāraśca grāhakatvaṃ ca anuvādanādau pravartamāna tāṃ asya pudgalasya praśnena anyena vā samācāreṇa [VinSū_41] jñātvā niśrayasya grahaṇamityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_587: [katamena vidhinā iti cet] // (392) saṃvaravat // iti upāsaka-saṃvarādivat mantrādinā vidhinā ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_589: asya tu - // (393)-(394) prapīḍya ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ ubhau pādatalau /
V03bsu058_u:17_590: parīkṣya dānamiti // niśrayasya kimasya saṃvaro rūḍhaḥ śaikṣaśca /
V03bsu058_u:17_596: upādhyāye sthite upādhyayatā eva niśritvam - [atrāpi] karmaṇi ktaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_597: niśrīyata iti niśritaḥ, niśraya ityarthaḥ / tadbhāve niśritattvam // (397) tasmāt agrahaṇamasya tatra /
V03bsu058_u:17_598: / asyeti niśrayasya / tatreti upādhyāye / etaduktaṃ bhavati - yasmādupādhyāyatve eva niśrayatvaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:17_600: grāhyaḥ iti // (398) nirapekṣatāsaṃpattiḥ ubhayoḥ āttaniśrayadhvaṃse kāraṇam /
V03bsu058_u:17_601: / ubhayoriti niśritaniśritavatoḥ sākṣeṇa krameṇa vā nirapekṣatāyāḥ saṃpattiḥ saṃpannatā /
V03bsu058_u:17_603: ekatra nirapekṣa[tā-bhūte] tāvat niśrayasyānuvṛttiḥ yāvat aparo nirapekṣābhūtaḥ iti /
V03bsu058_u:17_606: ityeṣā atra vyavasthā // [sahadarśaṃnāt upādhyāyasya udghāto niśrayo vaktavyaḥ] - (399) sannipattau anaupādhyāyena abhimatena pravṛttiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_607: / yadukte upādhyāye saṃnihite nānyaḥ āprāptavyaḥ ityasya tatpratipādanam /
V03bsu058_u:17_610: sannipatanaṃ sannipattiḥ, tena sannipattau satyāṃ abhimatena niśrayeṇa niśritasya pravṛttiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_611: yo 'sya rocate tasya niśrayeṇa vastavyam ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_616: / nidarśanaṃ upādhyāyaḥ, anyatrā 'pi niśraye vidheḥ vyavasthānāt /
V03bsu058_u:17_620: yatra niśrayo bhavati pratyahamāgatya upasaṃkrāmet ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_628: nāhatasya, pāpamitrasya ca // avasādanārhatvameva // (410) avasāditasaṃgrahe anyasya sthūlātyayaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_629: / evamapi kriyamāṇe yadi asau kṣamāṇe ādaraṃ na kurute,
V03bsu058_u:17_630: tatra kiṃ kartavyam - / (411) anādṛtau bhikṣoḥ praguṇīkaraṇāya prayogaḥ abhijñasya /
V03bsu058_u:17_633: / yena nimittena avasāditaḥ, tasya parityāge kṣamaṇam / na ca evameva, kiṃ tarhi, kṣamayataḥ - // (413-415) na anarhamavasādayet /
V03bsu058_u:17_634: / na arhasya na kṣameta // na anarhasya kṣameta // sarvathā // (416-418) niṣkāsanaṃ aka[ra]ṇīyatāyaṃ layanāt /
V03bsu058_u:17_643: / (nāśo rādhate(?), rātrivāsādutthitena dantakāṣthena anyena vā mukhe,
V03bsu058_u:17_644: niśrayasya anyasya vā vandanaṃ abhyavaharaṇaṃ vā akāryam iti asyaitatpratipādanam /
V03bsu058_u:17_648: anavetya mukhamalaṃ āhārapakṣatāṃ bhavadbhiḥ atikramaḥ kriyate ityasya,
V03bsu058_u:17_649: tadevaṃ pratipādanam // niśrayavṛttau ihoktikaṃ - “sārdhaṃvihārī antevāsī vā kalyameva utthāya parimāṇḍalaṃ nivasya āvṛtya ca,
V03bsu058_u:17_650: dantakāṣṭhaṃ visarjya antaḥ sīmni caityavaṃdanaṃ kṛtvā ityādi yatpariśodhatvaṃ mukhamālasya tadetaddantakāṣthaṃ visṛjya” ityatra vacanam /
V03bsu058_u:17_654: / praticchannameva // (426) nopabhogyasya ante vṛkṣasya kuḍyasya vā /
V03bsu058_u:17_655: / ante iti samīpe, yatra mahājanaḥ sadā āste tadatra upabhogyaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:17_658: / asyeti dantakāṣṭhasya / ā-aṣaṭakādipāṭhe 'tra saṃdhiḥ dvādaśāṅgulamārabhya yāvat aṣṭāṃgulatvaṃ pramāṇamasya ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_660: / aṃgulicatuṣkasya yaduttaraṃ anantaraṃ pramāṇaṃ tad yāvadbhāve [VinSū_43] pūrvapramāṇasya,
V03bsu058_u:17_663: api tu ye bahuśleṣmāṇaḥ taiḥ caturaṃgulavinirmuktaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ visarjayitavyam” iti /
V03bsu058_u:17_667: / atra dantakāṣṭhavisarjane pranāḍīmukhe guptiḥ praticchannatā saṃpadyata eva ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_670: pādadhāvanādau karaṇīye / hastasāmantakasya saṃbhāvyatvaṃ na hastasāmantakāt pareṇa dantakāṣṭhavisarjanādi kartavyamityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_674: // (434) sūcīdravyam // sūcīpuṭā kriyate raiti-tāmra-ayaḥ-kāṃsaiḥ tadrūpaiḥ ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:17_679: / (437-438) na tīkṣṇena dantaṃ jihvāṃ karṇaṃ coddhṛṣet /
V03bsu058_u:17_680_0: / na aśanaiḥ / śanaiḥ uddhṛṣedityarthaḥ // (439) abādhayantaṃ māṃsam // iti dantamāṃ sādi // (440) - na aprākṣālya digdhaṃ
V03bsu058_u:17_680_1: mukhamalena pradeśaṃ [anavaguṇṭhya vā pāṃśunā dantajihvayoḥ pavanaṃ chorayet] /
V03bsu058_u:17_682: asaṃbhave ambhasaḥ anavaguṇṭhya vā pāṃśunā dantajihvayoḥ pavanaṃ chorayet /
V03bsu058_u:17_683: pavanaṃ punaḥ anayoḥ yathākramaṃ dantakāṣthaṃ vidalaṃ ca /
V03bsu058_u:17_684: / (441) na viśabdyeti // yathoktaṃ dvayaṃ chorayet // (442) nidarśanametad // viśabdanasya dantajihvayoḥ pavanaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:17_688: / bhavati akheṭabhūtaṃ vāntaṃ, viriktaṃ vānuccārabhūtam, - tadyathā nāsāvireke atisāriṇaśca,
V03bsu058_u:17_689: yathā pītanirgame / tasmāt uccāra - kheṭābhidhāne satyapi vānta-virikta-grahaṇam /
V03bsu058_u:17_693: “dantakāsthasya alābhe gomayena uṣāṭukena ca mukhaṃ śodhayitavyam” ityatra granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_8: na ca mantavyaṃ - uṣāṭuka dantakāṣṭhopanāmanaṃ ityanenāsya virodhaḥ iti,
V03bsu058_u:19_13: / iti ārocite yatrāsau prītiṃ saṃdarśayati tasya priyasya upanāmayiṣyāmi asyedaṃ ityevaṃ manasikaraṇam /
V03bsu058_u:19_14: / (452) pātranirmādanam // (453) piṇḍapātikaścet niścayo bhavati rāvakasya ca /
V03bsu058_u:19_18: / nirmādanamiti saṃbaṃdhaḥ / prayojanaṃ punaḥ kadācit bahireva bhoktavyaṃ bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:19_20: / (455) so 'pi cet praśnaḥ // piṇḍapatiko bhavati, tataḥ piṇḍapāta-praveśārthaṃ sāhya-asāhya-praveśābhyāṃ kimasya abhirucitamiti jñānārthaṃ praśnaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_21: / (456) sāhyaṃ cet - // niśrayasya niśritena saha praveśe /
V03bsu058_u:19_27: / (459) asahaḥ cet - // iti praveśaḥ // - āgatya upadarśanam // [iti] piṇḍa kasya / [kīdṛśaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ iti cet - /
V03bsu058_u:19_39: / asammataṃ utthānakārakatvena gṛhitasaṃmārjanīkaṃ dṛṣṭvā alpotsu kaṃ kuryāt /
V03bsu058_u:19_42: sammataṃ tu utthānakārakattvena [VinSū_45] [cīvarasevakatvena vā] alpotsukaṃ akurvato nasti doṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_48: / niśrayaṃ anyaṃ ca bhikṣum / sarvādhikarikaḥ eṣa vidhiḥ // (477)śanaiḥ etad // argaḍakākoṭanam // (478) nāti velam // iti na muhurmuhuḥ argaḍakaṃ ākoṭayedityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_49: na tvenaṃ vidhyet // (479) ena nātivegena prapīḍayet /
V03bsu058_u:19_52: / yathā anyoḥ dhṛṣṭiḥ na bhavati tathā ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_53: / (481) satkuryādenam // [enamiti] niśrayam / antarāle niśraya-niśritādhikārasya aviccinnatvāt enaṃ-śabdo niśrayaparāmarśārthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_56: / (483) na tadviruddhamiti // ālīyeta ityanubandhaḥ / niśrayaviruddhasya na upaśliṣyāt ityathaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_57: / (484) apatrapeta ataḥ // ataḥ iti niśrayāt / yāvaduktaṃ bhavati - salajjenāsya bhavitavyamiti /
V03bsu058_u:19_59: / dakṣo 'nalasaḥ, asya niśrayasya // (486) satkṛtyakārī // yadasya karaṇīyaṃ tatsakṛtya katavyamityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_61: / (488) hrīmān sagauravaḥ / yadyapi hrīviśeṣo gauravaṃ, tathāpi netacchabdādasya gatiḥ ityasya grahaṇam /
V03bsu058_u:19_62: prasara-saṃ koco hrīḥ // (489) sapratīśa iti // parāyattatāsaṃvedanarūpo apatrāpyaviśeṣaḥ sapratīśatā /
V03bsu058_u:19_65: / etadgata-niśrayagrahaṇā 'pṛcchatā parivāradānādau ca anyatra vā niśritena kiṃkuśalagaveṣiṇā bhavitavyaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:19_69: sa niśritena vārayitavyaḥ // (494) avṛddhau kuśale anyatra tatkare samarpaṇāṃ yāceta /
V03bsu058_u:19_70: / yadi asya niśritasya tasminniśraye kuśaleṃ na vṛddharbhavati,
V03bsu058_u:19_71: tato 'sau enaṃ anyasmin kuśalavṛddhikare niśraye samarpaṇāṃ yāceta /
V03bsu058_u:19_72: / so 'pi enaṃ praśnādinā - (495) nirjñāya niśrayārhe arpayet /
V03bsu058_u:19_75: / kuśale niyogaḥ // tadupasaṃhāraḥ // kuśalopasaṃhāraḥ ityarthaḥ // (499) [vyutthā]panāyāṃ āpatteḥ ānulomike jīvitapariṣkārasaṃpattau [VinSū_46] ca udyogaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_76: / yathā niśritasya etad-dvayaṃ saṃpādyate tathā niśrayeṇa udyogaḥ karanīyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_77: so 'pyetad asmai kuryāt iti [catuḥ]-atikrāntātsūtrāt niśritenāpi ni [śrayasya] etad-dvayasaṃpattau udyogaḥ kartavyaḥ iti pratipattavyam /
V03bsu058_u:19_79: / ālaptako hi nāma priyatāṃ ālapanādi-priyācaraṇena upanītaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_80: saṃlaptako yena sārdhaṃ asya viśvastakasya kālena kālaṃ saṃlāpo vartate /
V03bsu058_u:19_81: / saṃstutako yena sārdhaṃ asya ekatra [sthāna-]gamanādinā saṃstavopagamanāt aṅgāṅgībhāvo jātaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_82: sapremako yad dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vā vinā 'ṅgāṅgībhāvena prītimātrakamutpannam /
V03bsu058_u:19_86: tena upādhyāyaḥ, tena ācārya ityādi / gurutvāt upādhyāyasya tataḥ pūrvayoḥ prathamaṃ arhatvaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:19_88: ataśca pratyasannataratvāt kṣiptasya pūrvasya prathamaṃ arhatvam /
V03bsu058_u:19_90: / ityācāryagrahaṇena ca // (503) sāhye aśaktau niśritaṃ yena pravṛttiḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_96: antarā, yadā yasya yena atipattiḥ, tadā tasmin pravrartitavyam /
V03bsu058_u:19_101: veṣamātreṇa yojitaḥ nādyāpi pravrājitaḥ sa pravrajitavat draṣṭavyaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_102: yathā pravrajitasyopasthānaṃ tathā tasya glānasya kartavyamityartha /
V03bsu058_u:19_107: yadi dattenā 'pi ekena abhavo bhavati upasthāyakasya,
V03bsu058_u:19_111: eko vā dvau vā saṃbahulā vā, antataḥ sarvasaṃghena upasthāpanaṃ karaṇīyam” - ityatra granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_112: / [bhaiṣajyapratiśaraṇatvāt -] (507) kalpate bhaiṣajyaṃ saṃghataḥ kevalasya glānasya paribhoga iti /
V03bsu058_u:19_114: glānaiḥ bhikṣubiḥ paribhoktavyaṃ iti [VinSū_47] yattasyaitena saṃgrahaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_121: / āmuktakamapi yatpratimāyāṃ caitye vā ābharaṇādibhirapi yāvaddeyaṃ anyābhāve kaḥ [puna]rvādo 'nyasyetyarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_123: / asaṃpattāviti vartate, svasyābhāve, sāṃdhikat / asyeti sāṃghikasya (512) abhāve asya bauddhikāt /
V03bsu058_u:19_124: (513) deyatvaṃ ābhyāṃ ārtasya tenāmṛtyau sati vibhave /
V03bsu058_u:19_126: asati tu dāne doṣābhāvaḥ // (514) nopasthāyakaḥ enaṃ nopatiṣṭhet /
V03bsu058_u:19_127: / enamiti glānam // (515) na arthyāṃ asya dharmyā ca ājñāṃ vilomayet /
V03bsu058_u:19_132: upayācita iti glānena, upasthāyakaḥ // (517) na nāvavadet iti // glānamupasthāyakaḥ // (519) nainaṃ glāno atilaṃghayet upasthāyakena kṛtaṃ avavādaṃ na glāno atikramedityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_133: / (519) sāṃghikādenaṃ asau upasthāyakaḥ - maraṇaśaṃkāyāṃ śayanāsanādutthāpya paudagalike niveśayeta /
V03bsu058_u:19_138: maraṇāvasthāparicchede yasyāṃ śarīrāvasthāyāṃ maraṇāśaṃkā bhavati tasyāmityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_141: / tena glānena kṛtasaṃkleśānāṃ tanmṛtacīvarāṇāṃ iti yasyāsau glānasya upasthāyakaḥ tasya eva mṛtasya yadi tāni cīvarāṇi bhavanti,
V03bsu058_u:19_142: na anyasya, tesāṃ dhāvanam / tasya upasthāyakasya karaṇīyamityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_147: / tatsthaviraḥ // (525) te 'pi enamiti / yeṣāṃ asau sthaviraḥ, te 'pi enaṃ gamanavilaṃbitaṃ udīkṣeran /
V03bsu058_u:19_149: / (527) grāmānte ca / samīpavācī atra antaśabdaḥ // (528) praveśaścet atra anuyāntam /
V03bsu058_u:19_151: udīkṣamāṇānāṃ - (529) dūtaścet syāt “āgamaya yāvatsthavira [VinSū_48] āgacchati” iti brūyuḥ /
V03bsu058_u:19_152: / enamiti dūtam // (530) pāṇyudakadāne ca gatatve abhyavahārāya asti cetkālaḥ iti /
V03bsu058_u:19_153: / gatatve bhojanāya pānakāya vā pāṇyudakadānavelāyāṃ yadi bilambamānānāṃ kālo 'sti,
V03bsu058_u:19_154: tato dūtamenaṃ brayuḥ - “āgamaya yāvat saṃghasthavira āgacchati” iti /
V03bsu058_u:19_156: / asati udīkṣaṇakāle bhojanādi-upaveśe saṃghasthavirasya āsanaṃ moktavyam /
V03bsu058_u:19_158: / saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ antargṛhe, bahiḥ iti āśramapadāt // anayoḥ avasthayoḥ pratyavekṣaṇāṃ saṃghasthavireṇa kartavyam /
V03bsu058_u:19_159: / mā 'tra kaścit dusprāvṛto anivasto vā ityedarthaṃ - /
V03bsu058_u:19_160: / (533) dusprāvṛtatve durnivastatāyāṃ vā sauṣṭhavārthaṃ anayoḥ nimittaṃ asmai kurvīta /
V03bsu058_u:19_162: nimittamasmai iti yo 'sau duṣprāvṛto durnivasto vā /
