V03bsu058_u:34_12: evaṃ ca ekadvīpakānāmapi eṣa mukha-karṇaprāvaraṇādīnāṃ pratikṣiptatvaṃ veditavyam /
V03bsu058_u:34_14: glānena ca itareṣām // ekanakhādīnāṃ ca adhuktānāṃ [hasta]chinnādinā ākṣiptatvaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:34_15: itaresāṃ tu ābādhikānāṃ, glānena 'mā 'si glānaḥ' ityanena ākṣiptatvaṃ ityarthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:34_16: / ekanakho, yasya ekameva nakham / samudralekho, yasya mudrāyuktamiva lekhaṃ śarīrāvayavaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:34_17: pakṣaheto, yasya ekaṃ pārśvaṃ śuṣkam / liṅgaśirā, yasya liṅgākāraṃ śiraḥ / gulmakeśo [VinSū_57] yasya vidūṣakasya ivā 'ntarāgulmena avasthitāḥ keśāḥ /
V03bsu058_u:34_19: antaḥ kubjo bahīḥ kubjaḥ antarbahiḥ kubja iti,
V03bsu058_u:34_20: uktametad anyatra- 'kāṇaḥ, kuṇiḥ, kubjo 'tha, vāma' iti, prabhedasaṃdarśanārthaṃ tvetad /
V03bsu058_u:34_25: nakulākṣaḥ, kiṃpilākṣaḥ, viparītākṣaḥ, militākṣaḥ, śikyākṣaḥ, kaśmīlitākṣaḥ, akṣākṣaḥ / pakṣmākṣo, yasya akṣṇo 'ntaḥ carmapuṭe pakṣmasaṃbhavaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:34_28: apāṅgasamīpavarti yo akṣyavayavaḥ sa yasya nāsāsamīpe,
V03bsu058_u:34_30: asau viparītākṣaḥ / yasya vigatanāsāvaṃśe parasparaṃ akṣiṇī-saṃśleṣṭe,
V03bsu058_u:34_31: asau militākṣaḥ / śikyākṣo, yasya śikyavat atilaṃbite akṣiṇī /
V03bsu058_u:34_32: galitapakṣmaromatvāt vigaladraktamāsavat akṣṇaḥ paryanto yasya asau kaśmīlitākṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:34_33: akṣākṣaḥ iti akṣayoḥ akṣiṇī yasya asau akṣākṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:34_34: akṣiśāla-śantra dardru-vicarcikā iti akṣiśabdasya pratyekaṃ nipātaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:34_35: akṣiśālaḥ, akṣiśantraḥ, akṣidardruḥ akṣivicarcikā / ativiśāle yasya akṣiṇī asau viśālākṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:34_37: raktakarṇaḥ, nāḍīkarṇa iti // kaṇḍu-piṇḍa-sthūlakacchuriti kacchuśabdasya pratyekaṃ saṃbandhaḥ-kaṇḍukacchuḥ,
V03bsu058_u:34_38_0: piṇḍakacchuḥ, sthūlakacchuriti // aṇḍalāṅgulapraticchanna iti aṇḍābhyāṃ lāṅgūlaḥ praticchannaḥ asya iti aṇḍalāṅgūlapraticchanna
V03bsu058_u:34_38_1: iti aṇḍābhyāṃ lāṅgūlaḥ praticchannaḥ asya iti aṇḍalāṅgūlapraticchanaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:34_40: mūḍha ityanena upasaṃpadaṃ na jānātītyasya saṃgṛhītatvam /
V03bsu058_u:34_41: / ajihva iti [jihvāhī]nasya / mūkavadhira iti mūkagraḥaṇena satyāṃ jihvāyāṃ vaktumasamarthaḥ jihvāhīnaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:34_43: / [ekahastapādaḥ iti ekaśabdasya] hastapādaśabdayoḥ pratyekaṃ saṃbandhaḥ - ekahastaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:34_44: ekapādaḥ, ahastapāda iti // nīlakeśa iti aharitabhūtaṃ nīlaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:34_46: / hasti-aśva-śva-go-meṣa-mṛga-matsya-ahi-dīrgha-bahuśīrṣa iti śīrṣaśabdasya pratyekaṃ abhisaṃbaṃdhaḥ - hastiśīrṣaḥ aśvaśīrṣaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:34_47: śvaśīrṣo, gośīrṣaḥ, meṣaśīrṣaḥ, mṛgaśīrṣaḥ, matsyaśīrṣaṃḥ, ahiśīrṣaḥ, dīrghaśīrṣa, bahuśīrṣaḥ iti / 'sarvanīlaḥ sarvapītaḥ sarvalohitaḥ sarvāvadāta' iti etadapi yatpaṭhyate,
V03bsu058_u:34_50_0: / (636) caureṇa dasyoḥ // ākṣiptatvamiti anuṣaṅgaḥ / pāpavṛttirūpatā sāmānyena / nanu naiva asya ataḥ pṛthaktvam? - bhavani
V03bsu058_u:34_51: sarveṇa sarvaṃ yadbhūyasā yasya vā abhiprāṇātipātapravarttā /
V03bsu058_u:36_4: / asatyapi janakatve mātāpitṛparigraheṇa avasthitayoḥ anujñāne saptāhadhāraṇe saṃghe ca ārocane [mātā-]pitṛtvaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:36_6: “putrakṛtakaṃ tāvat, bhadanta, upasaṃpādayanti, kasya sakāśā[dava]sāritavyaḥ? - yasya putratvamupagataḥ,
V03bsu058_u:36_7: evaṃ dhītikṛtikā yasya dhītitvaṃ upagatikā” - ityatra granthaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:36_10: tiryagyonigatau vā, tasya keśāvaropaṇāya sarvasaṃgho 'valokayitavyaḥ? - no hīdaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:36_11: upālin” ityatra granthaḥ // (640) na ataḥ ānantaryotthāṇam /
V03bsu058_u:36_13: / (641) janakābhyāmetad, parivṛttavyaṃjanābhyāmapi // apuṃstvamapi mātṛgatātve 'pi tuṣka strītvaṃ utthānamānantaryasya /
V03bsu058_u:36_15: / etatkṛtvaṃ ānantaryakṛtvaṃ, yad māṭṛghātakādeḥ pravrājanaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ tatra ānantaryakṛtvaṃ tattu pratipattavyam /
V03bsu058_u:36_16: ānantaryakārī na pravrājyaḥ ityevaṃ puna stad /
V03bsu058_u:36_17: na sarvamātṛghāṭako na pravrājya ityevaṃ ca /
V03bsu058_u:38_0: kasmin bhikṣuṇyāṃ kṛte bhikṣuṇīdūṣakatvaṃ jātaṃ bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:38_4: aparājitatve // “kiyatā, bhadanta, bhikṣuṇīdūṣako vaktavyaḥ? - yena abrahmacaryeṇa,
V03bsu058_u:38_9: no tu sahite pratiyogisvādanena dūṣakatvasya utthānam,
V03bsu058_u:38_10: ityasya na hi anya-pradoṣeṇa anyasya saṃbaṃdhaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:38_13: 'chandaśaḥ' iti yadvacanaṃ, eṣo 'tra āgamaḥ / svecchayā ityasya arthaḥ / pārājitatve 'pi bhikṣu-bhikṣuṇītvaṃ vidyate kim,
V03bsu058_u:38_14: tadavasthayoḥ nā 'pyanayoḥ dūṣaṇe dūṣakatvamityatra [VinSū_59] āha - aparājitatve /
V03bsu058_u:38_15: grantho 'tra - “aṣṭau tāvat, bhadanta, pudgalā pratyekavastubhīḥ bhikṣuṇīṃ dūṣayanti /
V03bsu058_u:38_17: upālin, vaktavyā / katarāḥ tatra pudgalā bhikṣuṇī-dūṣakā vaktavyāḥ? - āha,
V03bsu058_u:38_18: na kaściditi / nipātane vā āmarṣaṇe vā aparājitatvaṃ bhikṣuṇyā iti hi etad adūṣakatva-vijñānam /
V03bsu058_u:38_23: puruṣasyopakrāntiḥ // (644) arhatvaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyāṃ yoṣiti /
V03bsu058_u:38_24: / śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hīnāyāṃ vṛttāyāṃ striyāṃ vyaṃjanaparivṛttyā puṃstvogatau arhatvaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ /
V03bsu058_u:38_27: / 'arhatvaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyāṃ yoṣiti' - ityanubandhaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:38_29: / poṣadhavastu atra granthaḥ - “yaduktaṃ bhagavatā bhikṣuṇī bhiḥ bhikṣūṇāmantike bhikṣuṇībhāvaḥ paryeṣitavyaḥ iti katamesāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ āvāsika-naivāsikānāṃ,
V03bsu058_u:38_30: upālin”, iti / tatsthānagatā vāsasthaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ upaniśritya bhikṣuṇīnāṃ vāsaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:38_32: na ca niśrayātikramo yuktaḥ ityetad vijñānam /
V03bsu058_u:38_37: gṛhyamāṇe saṃvare tasya saṃvarasya yadbhavatvaṃ tasya tadavasthasya utsṛṣṭau pratyākhyānādinā utsarge dhvaṃso bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:38_39: na ca āneghasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ laṅghanādau dṛśyate /
V03bsu058_u:38_40: tasmāt, na bhavatyasyā 'jāyamānatve saṃvarasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ iti yo manyeta tannābhinivṛttyartha etatsūtram /
